This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and three children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to give credit to her clients.
Martires is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for 15 years, starting with a small amount of capital that she saved. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business to buy some canned products, oil cans, and other foods, She operates a Colmado, a place where you can find all the ingredients to make your daily food. Normally those colmados are in the same neighborhood, just a short walk from any home. She will use the profits to invest in her business and to save because she wants to buy a small pick up (vehicle). Her future plans are to improve her business.
This Esperanza associate began with us because her business needed capital and she found this program very interesting. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally.

loan.use: To buy some canned products, oil cans, and other foods

loan.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi F. is a fishmonger at Abura. She also cooks food for sale. She is single but takes care of five dependants. She has been in this trade for two years. She is responsible for the upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy foodstuffs to cook and sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her dependants. In this picture, Esi is showing some of the plantains she fries and sells.

loan.use: To buy foodstuffs to cook and sell

loan.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Vctor, de 45 aos de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazn donde vive con su esposa y tres hijos: Sarai de 13 aos, Katherine de 6 y Keily de 4 aos de edad, l tiene un taller de reparacin de vehculos desde hace 15 aos, es propio y lo realiza en ocasiones a domicilio, tiene tambin venta de repuestos, este oficio lo aprendi desde joven y hasta el momento es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta la familia. Vctor est solicitando un prstamo para compra de herramientas, llaves y un compresor, con esta ayuda podr desempear el trabajo de una manera ms eficiente, agradar a los clientes por el buen servicio y garantizar mejores ingresos para su hogar. El objetivo de l es cancelar oportunamente este prstamo, generar ingresos para terminar de cancelar un lote y comenzar a construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Vctor, 45, lives in San Francisco Gotera, Morazn department with his wife and three children: Sarai, 13, Katherine, 6, and Keily, 4. He has had a car repair shop for the last 15 years. Its his own and sometimes he provides in-home services. He also sells replacement parts. He learned this occupation when very young and to date is his familys main source of income.
Vctor is asking for a loan to buy tools, wrenches and a compressor. With this help he will be able to work more efficiently, please his customers with the good service and guarantee better income for his household.
His objective is to repay the loan on time, to generate income to finish paying for a lot and to start building his own house.

loan.use: To buy tools, wrenches and a compressor.

loan.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama A. sells sweet doughnuts at Abura. She is single but takes care of three children. She is responsible for feeding, clothing and educating her children. Her loan will be used to buy flour, sugar and other ingredients to prepare the doughnuts to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to provide a meaningful education to her children.

loan.use: To buy flour, sugar and other ingredients to make doughnuts

loan.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua A. is married to a farmer and has five dependents. She sells smoked fish for sale at Abura. She Ekua has been in this business for eighteen years. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used added to buy more fish for sale to expand her business. Ekua plans of reinvesting her profit back into her business.

loan.use: To buy more fish for sale

loan.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: Jos, de 36 aos de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de bloques para construccin y gas propano, l vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 10 y 8 aos de edad, este negocio funciona de manera de reventa el proceso es que Jos compra los bloques a distribuidores mayoristas para luego revenderlos a los pobladores cercanos. Jos en apoyo a su esposa quiere comprarle una plancha para hacer pupusas y que ella pueda atender un nuevo negocio que lleve beneficios para el hogar, l solicita un prstamo que ser invertido en esta compra. Suea con ser distribuidor mayorista de bloques, crecer en los negocios y estabilizar los ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Jos lives in the San Miguel department. He is 36 years old and lives with his wife and two children, ages ten and eight. He works selling cinder blocks used in construction and propane gas. His business is based on resale in that he buys cinder blocks from wholesale distributors that are to then be sold to local residents. Jos dreams of one day becoming a wholesale cinder block distributor, advance in business and achieve stability in the family income.
The loan Jos is requesting will be used to support his wife by purchasing a grill she can use to make pupusas [a traditional Salvadoran dish]. This will allow her to focus on a new business that will benefit their household.

loan.use: To purchase a grill for making pupusas [a traditional Salvadoran dish]

loan.name: Juana Constantina

texts.es:
Juana es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo II del distrito Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 58 aos, de estado civil madre soltera, tiene 02 hijos independientes, realiz estudios hasta 3 de educacin primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 aos, su primer prstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual lo invirti en su negocio de venta de golosina y galletas.
Su nuevo crdito es de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, con el cul comprar golosinas, galletas y detergentes, lo ayuda su hijo y su sobrina, la seora sale con su negocio a las ferias.
Su visin es mejorar el negocio.
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the 3 de Mayo II communal bank in Puno district which is in Puno province and department. She is 58 years old and a single mother of two independent children. She went up to 3rd grade.
She has collaborated with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two years. Her first, 300 new sol, loan was invested in her sweets and cookie selling business.
Her new, 500 new sol, loan will be used to buy sweets, cookies and detergents. Her son and niece help her. She takes her business to the market. Her vision is to improve the business.
What she likes about the communal bank is what her savings earn.

loan.use: To buy sweets, cookies and other products, like detergents.

loan.name: Kathlen Marvely

texts.es: Doa Kathlen, resiD. en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, tienen casa propia y ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa, tiene 42 aos D. edad, este negocio es D. forma ambulante ofreciendo las prendas D. vestir por las aceras del mercado municipal y sus alrededores D. la ciudad. Ella quiere aprovechar la temporada buena para vender que es la ltima semana D. diciembre y solicita la ayuda a travs D. un prstamo para poder invertirlo en prendas D. vestir como pantalones, blusas, camisetas, short, calcetines y bxer, esta compra ser oportuna ya que ha aumentado la demanda D. ropa. Su aspiracin principal son sus hijos, es por ellos por quien ella cada da sale a vender para generar ingresos que solventen sus necesidades y mejoren sus condiciones D. vida.
texts.en: Doa Kathlen lives in San Miguel, department of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and two children. They have their own home, and she works selling clothes. She is 42 years old. She works as a street vendor, offering her clothing items around the municipal market and its surroundings in the city. She wants to make the most of this good shopping season which is the last week in December and asks for support through a loan so that she can invest in items of clothing such as pants, shirts, tee shirts, shorts, socks and boxers. This purchase will be timely, as the demand for clothes has already increased. Her main aspiration is her sons, for whom she goes out to work every day to generate income to meet their needs and improve their living conditions.

loan.use: To purchase pants, shirts, tee shirts, shorts, socks and boxers

loan.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo II del distrito Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 39 aos de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 03 hijos (02 independientes), la seora realizo estudios de educacin primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 02 aos, su prstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizo para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta al por menor de ropas para nios.
Su nuevo crdito es de S/. 700.00 nuevos soles, con la que podr comprar ropas para nios de primera y segunda mano, sus hijos trabajan junto con su padre en la empresa Cocacola como chofer.
Su visin en el negocio es ser mayorista de abarrotes.
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la unin y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Justina is a member of the 3 de Mayo II Communal Bank in the district of Puno, province of Puno and department of Puno. She is 39 years old, married and has 3 children (2 independent). She has completed elementary education.

She has worked with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years. Her first loan was for 300.00 Nuevos Soles, money which she used to increase capital for her business selling first and second-hand childrens clothing. Her children work with her husband for the Cocacola business as drivers.

Her business vision is to be a wholesaler of groceries.

What she likes about her Communal Bank is the union and what she gains from saving.

loan.use: To purchase and sell children clothing

loan.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis de 27 aos, es un hombre trabajador que desde joven le gusto mantener a sus hijos ya que se uni a su esposa muy joven. Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada suburbio ha trabajado como comerciante informal hace varios aos.
Como no consegua trabajo fijo decidi iniciar como comerciante informal y empezar a vender juguetes, sandalias, carteras etc. En la actualidad trabaja solo recorriendo las calles de los pueblos que visita para vender mercadera como Milagros, Santa Elena, Playas. La mercadera la vende por unidad a diferentes precios.
El quiere continuar con sus ventas de mercadera variada para darles una buena vida a sus hijos de 8 y 4 aos por eso quiere comprar con el prstamo juguetes, sabanas, sandalias etc. Una de sus proyecciones para los prximos 5 aos es tener un capital estable para ubicar un local.
texts.en:
Luis, 27 years old, is a working man who has enjoyed taking care of his children since youth, as he married his wife very young. Living in an urban area known as a suburb, he has worked as an informal merchant for several years.

Since he could not find a permanent job, he started working as an informal merchant and started selling toys, sandals, wallets, etc Now he works alone along the streets of the neighborhoods that he visits to sell his merchandise such as Milagros, Santa Elena, Playas. He sells his merchandise by the unit at varying prices.

He wants to continue his sales in diverse merchandise in order to give a good life to his children of 8 and 4 years old. For this reason, he wants to use this loan to purchase toys, sheets, sandals, etc One of his securities for the next 5 years is to have a stable uncome to open a shop.

loan.use: To purchase toys, sheets

loan.name: Roberto Isaias

texts.es: Roberto es agricultor, su esposa atiende la parte comercial, sus hijos lo mayores le apoya en el trabajo agrcola. El cliente considera hacer mejoras en su vivienda poco a poco como planes. Desde hace 22 aos se dedica a la agricultura. El principal problema es la afectacin de plaga y enfermedades, as como el robo de la produccin. Inicio con apoyo de la reforma agraria por medio de la organizacin cooperativa. Como proyecto para el negocio es hacer trabajos de conservacin de suelo. Este prstamo ser invertido en compra de fertilizantes para brindarle el mantenimiento agronmico al cultivo de caf. Agradeciendo a la institucin ya que le permitir obtener una cosecha productiva.
texts.en: Roberto is a farmer, his wife handles the business side, and his oldest children help in agriculture. The customer wants to make improvements in his home little by little. He has been a farmer for over 22 years, the biggest problem that he faces are plagues and disease to his crops as well as the theft of production. Roberto began with the help of agrarian reform through a cooperative organization, and as a project for the business they have a conservation project for the soil. This loan will be used to buy fertilizers to give his coffee crops the best care. Roberto is grateful to the institution since it will allow him to have a productive harvest.

loan.use: To buy fertilizer to take care of his crops.

loan.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo tiene 27 aos, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. Desde hace ms de 3 aos se dedica a ensear danzas tpicas a grupos de nios escolares, que estudian dentro de su zona. Asimismo su esposo, quien tambin es profesor de danza, elabora las vestimentas y mascaras con diseos tpicos de su ciudad, logrando venderlas a sus alumnos, de esa manera se genera ms ingresos. Considera su trabajo muy rentable, es por esta razn que esta dispuesta a tener mas adelante una tienda de venta de vestuario y disfraces tpicos. Es su crdito nmero 8 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que sern gestoras del prstamo que solicita a que le ser muy til en el progreso de su actividad econmica. Con el crdito que recibir, lo invertir en la compra de telas para elaborar nuevos disfraces.
texts.en: Consuelo is 27 years old. She lives with her husband and her 2 children in a rented home. Since more than 3 years ago, she has taught traditional dances to schoolchildren groups that study in her area. Also her husband, who is also a dance teacher, makes costumes and masks with traditional designs of their city, selling them to their students to generate more income. She considers her business very successful, which is why she has decided to move forward starting a shop to sell traditional clothing and costumes. This is her eighth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support, and she is thankful to be part of her community bank because all its members are people that she knows are responsible and supportive. She thanks all the people who are part of the loan that she requests as it will be very useful in the progress of her business. With the loan that she receives, she will invest in the purchase of fabrics to make new costumes.

loan.use: To purchase fabric to make traditional clothing

loan.name: Sonia Esperanza

texts.es: Doa Sonia, tiene 56 aos de edad, reside en San Miguel departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hermana, se dedica a la venta de utensilios de cocina, verduras y flores, desde muy pequea trabaja en los mercados municipales, actualmente tiene un puesto permanente donde ofrecer flores naturales en todas las pocas del ao, frutas, verduras y utensilios de cocina. Ella necesita invertir en el negocio y para realizar dicha inversin solicita un prstamo para compra verduras como tomates, cebollas, zanahorias, chiles y repollos. Su intencin de invertir en este momento es por la llegada de la navidad y fin ao donde la gente busca verduras para preparar la cena del 24 y 31 de diciembre, le ayudara a atender la demanda y a recibir mejores ganancias ya que por la poca todo se vende ms caro. Su objetivo es mejorar la atencin y el servicio a los clientes, adecuar el negocio y seguir trabajando por su bienestar.
texts.en:
Doa Sonia is 56 years old. She lives in San Miguel, department of San Miguel. She lives with her sister. She works selling kitchen utensils, vegetables and flowers. Since very young, she has worked in the municipal markets. Now she has a permanent stand where she offers natural flowers at all times of the year, fruits, vegetables and kitchen utensils.

She needs to invest in the business, and to realize this investment, she has requested a loan to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, carrots, chilies and cabbage. Her intention is to invest now for the arrival of Christmas and New Years when people are looking for vegetables to prepare their dinners for the 24th and 31st of December. She will help to meet the demand and receive more profits because at this time of year everything sells for more expensive.

Her goal is to improve her customer service, adapt her business and keep working for her wellbeing.

loan.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions, carrots, chilies and cabbage

loan.name: Karen Estela

texts.es:
Karen es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo II del distrito Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 aos, de estado civil soltera, la seorita en la actualidad sigue estudiando.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 07 meses, su prstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de tienda general.
Su nuevo crdito es de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, lo invertir en juguetes, y toda clase de muecas para venderlos en navidad, y es ayudada por su mam.
Su visin en terminar su carrera y tener un depsito de abarrotes.
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la unin y la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Karen is a member of the 3 de Mayo II communal bank in Puno district, Puno province and department. She is 19 years sold, single and still in school.
She has collaborated with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 7 months. Her initial loan was for 300 new soles that she used to invest in her general store.
Her new, 800 new sol, loan will be used to buy toys and all kinds of dolls to sell for Christmas. Her mother helps her.
Her vision is to finish her career and to have a grocery warehouse.
What she enjoys about her communal bank is the unity and the ease of the loan.

loan.use: To buy toys, like dolls, to sell for Christmas.

loan.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Mara mujer con una gran iniciativas de bsqueda de fuente de trabajo, se desempea en la aria de comercio desde hace 13 aos unas de las dificultades que se le ha presentado es el alza de los precios de los productos al comprarlo implicando aumento en los precios al venderlo. Bajando un poco las ventas al inicio de aplicar el nuevo precio pero despus se estabiliza las utilidades. Inicio con mucho esfuerzo con fondo propio despus ingreso en los programas de prstamos que ofrecemos como financiera y ah ido mejorando las ventas la tener mayor variedad y cantidad. El prstamo que est solicitando es para la compra de: arroz, frijoles, aceite, harina, papel higinico, jabones de bao, lavar trasto y de lavar ropa, y otros productos aumentando sus inventario para aumentar sus utilidades. Tiene como proyecto la aplicacin del local as mismo la captacin de ms clientela. Siendo una realizada el crecimiento de su negocio y el mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Mara is a woman with great initiative in her search for employment; she has worked as a salesperson for over 13 years. One of the problems that she faces is the increase in prices for products that she buys which means that she has to increase her sale prices as well which leads to a decrease in Maras sales but later her profits stabilize. Mara began her job with a lot of hard work and her savings and later with loan programs that were offered through Kivas field partner. She has been improving her sales by having a greater variety and quantity of products. The loan will be used to buy: rice, beans, oil, flour, toilet paper, soap, dishwashing liquid and detergent and other products increasing her inventory to increase her profits. She has as a project to expand her store so that she can have more customers. Once Mara grows her business her quality of life will improve as well.

loan.use: To buy basic household goods to stock her business.

loan.name: Roger Osvaldo

texts.es: Roger Osvaldo V. R., tiene la edad de 24 aos, est Soltero. El quiere comprar unos implementos necesarios para poder seguir con su pequeo negocio del arreglo de motocicletas. El necesita compra un compresor, herramientas de precisin y una prensa entre otros. El hace aos se ha dedicado a este profesin y tiene la experiencia para seguir mejorando su negocio por lo cual necesita realizar la compra de esas maquinas. Con sta opcin l pretende mejorar su calidad de atencin al cliente y a su vez ir generando dinero para seguir adelante con su vida y negocio. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Roger Osvaldo V. R., 24, is single. He wants to buy some tools that he needs to continue with his small motorcycle repair shop. He needs a compressor, precision instruments and a press, among others. He has been in this profession for years and has experience to continue improving the business which is why he needs to buy these machines. With this option he intends to improve the quality of his customer service while generating money to continue with his life and business.
This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with the easiest terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: To buy some tools for the shop.

loan.name: Maria Bersabe

texts.es: Doa Mara D. 63 aos D. edad, vive con su esposo Daniel, tiene casa propia ubicada en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, se dedica a vender especias (condimentos), como achiote, pimienta, cominos en el mercado municipal D. San Francisco Gotera en Morazn. Ella quiere diversificar su negocio y solicita un prstamo para que le ayuD. a comprar verduras y frutas aprovechado que para estas fiestas estos productos tienen mayor demanda, Su objetivo es innovar en el mercado, atraer a nuevos clientes para el consumo D. lo que se ofrece mejorando as el negocio, creciendo como comerciante y desarrollndose en una nueva actividad que espera le traiga buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Mara, 63, lives with her husband, Daniel. She owns her house located in San Miguel, San Miguel department. She sells spices (condiments) like achiote, pepper and cumin in San Francisco Goteras Municipal Market in Morazn.
She wants to diversify her business and is asking for a loan that will help her buy vegetables and fruit taking advantage of these festive times when these products are in higher demand.
Her objective is to innovate in the market, to attract new customers to buy what she offers thus improving the business and growing as a merchant and developing in a new activity which she hopes will bring good profits.

loan.use: To buy fruit and vegetables.

loan.name: Maame Abana

texts.en: Maame Abana K. is married and has five dependents. Her husband is an electrician. Abana has received a junior high education. She cooks beans and serves them with gari (cassava) and fried plantain at Abura. . She assists her husband in the general upkeep of their home. Her loan will be used to buy more ingredients to cook for sale. Abana hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a shop. In this picture, Abana is dishing out the beans. The bowl in front of her has fried plantain in it.

loan.use: To buy more ingredients to cook for sale.

loan.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa K. is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. Adjoa has received a junior high education. She sells clothing and underwear at Abura. She assists her husband in providing the basic needs of the family. Her loan will be used to buy more clothing and underwear for resale. Adjoa hopes to reinvest her new profits.

loan.use: To buy more clothing and underwear for resale.

loan.name: Gerbert Ernesto

texts.es: Don Gerbert, tiene 41 aos de edad, reside en Usulutn, se dedica al cultivo de maz y crianza de cerdos, l vive con su familia, posee casa propia, tiene experiencia en el cultivo y se dedica desde hace mucho a esta actividad como fuente de ingreso para la manutencin de su familia. l est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de insumos agrcolas, como abono, fertilizantes y tratamientos para plagas, elementos que son muy necesarios para el proceso de la siembra, con esta ayuda y contando con todos los materiales espera realizar una buena siembra y que el desarrollo de la milpa sea adecuada para que de buena produccin. Su objetivo es como cada ao realizar un buen trabajo y de este obtener lo necesario para ayudar a su familia con la alimentacin que necesitan.
texts.en:
Don Gerbert is 41 years old and lives in Usulutn. He lives with his family in their home, which he owns. He grows corn and raises hogs and over a long period of time he has gained experience in agricultural activities, which has become a source of income for supporting his family.
He is requesting a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and pest control treatments, which are essential for the sowing process. With this aid and with all the necessary supplies, Don Gerbert hopes to see progress in the corn that will be sufficient for producing a good crop.
His goal, as in each year, is to do a good job so that he can provide for his family with the food they need.

loan.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and pest control treatments

loan.name: Omar De Jess

texts.es:
Con 51 aos de edad y 2 hijos, Fernando Quintero Toro, vio en la carpintera el oficio que le permitira garantizarle un mejor futuro a su familia, situacin que lo llev a trabajar desde hace 18 aos en esta labor que tambin es considerada un arte.
Actualmente este microempresario requiere del apoyo econmico para comprar una mquina que le permitir mejorar y agilizar sus procesos, as como la adquisicin de un taladro y materia prima, lo que se traducir en productos de mejor calidad y mayores ingresos para el sustento familiar.
Abrir su local en un lugar diferente a su casa, es el sueo de este empresario quien as lograr exhibir mejor sus productos e incrementar sus ventas, que son todava muy limitadas.
texts.en:
Fernando Quintero Toro is 51 years old, and he has two children. He saw in carpentry the trade that would allow him to guarantee a better future for his family. He has been working in carpentry for 18 years, and he considers it an art.
This small businessman now needs financial support to be able to buy a machine that will allow him to improve and accelerate his work. He will get a drill and raw materials, which will translate into better quality products and greater income to support his family.
Opening a spot in a place other than his house is this small businessmans dream. That way he will manage to better display his products and increase his sales, which are still very limited.

loan.use: Purchase machinery for carpentry business

loan.name: Luzmila Hilda

texts.es:
Luzmila es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo II del distrito Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 50 aos, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos (01 independiente), realizo estudios de educacin secundaria.
Trabaja hace ms de 07 aos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su prstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual lo invirti en su negocio de venta de al por menor de productos de confitera y golosinas.
Ahora solicitar un nuevo crdito de S/. 600.00 nuevos soles, comprar ocho paquetes de huevo para venderlos en la panadera.
Su sueo es tener una empresa para vender productos de Herbalife.
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a member of the 3 de Mayo II communal bank in Puno district, Puno province and department. Shes 50 years old and in a common law relationship. She has two children, one of whom is independent. She finished secondary school.
She has collaborated with the Manuela Ramos Movement for over 7 years. Her initial loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her retail sweets and snacks business.
Now she is asking for a 600 new sol loan to buy 8 packages of eggs to sell in the bakery.
Her dream is to have a firm to sell Herbalife products.
What she likes about the communal bank is its punctuality and responsibility.

loan.use: To buy 8 packages of eggs to resell at retail in the bakery.

loan.name: Mara

texts.es:
Mara es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo II del distrito Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 38 aos de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 06 hijos, la seora realiz estudios de educacin secundaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace 02 aos, su prstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de venta de animales menores.
Su nuevo crdito es de S/. 1200.00 nuevos soles, con el que podr comprar en gran cantidad de cuy, gallinas, cuenta que har sus casas de los animales, participan en este negocio sus hijos, su esposo trabaja en construccin.
Su visin es que sus hijos salgan profesionales para que no tengan problemas econmicos.
Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y intercambiar palabras con las socias.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the communal bank, "3 de Mayo II," located in the Puno district of Puno province in the department of Puno. She is a 38-year-old married woman with six children. She has a high school education.
Mara has been working with Movimiento Manuela R. for two years. The first loan she received was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles. She invested those funds in her business selling small animals.
Her new loan is in the amount of 1200 nuevos soles. This loan will allow her to buy a large quantity of guinea pigs and hens. She also plans to build housing for them. Her children help her with her business and her husband works in construction.
Her dream is that her children will become professionals so that they won't have any financial worries. She appreciates the punctuality of her communal bank and the fact that it gives her the opportunity to talk with the other bank members.

loan.use: Purchase of small animals such as hens and guinea pigs, among others.

loan.name: Aracely Noemi

texts.es:
Aracely de 27 aos, tiene una nia de 10 aos y est separada de su esposo pero eso no la detuvo para ser una mujer emprendedora y empezar a obtener su propio dinero vendiendo ropa como comerciante informal.
En la actualidad vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraso en donde trabajo durante aos vendiendo ropa. Tuvo una oportunidad de tener un lugar en la Baha (lugar utilizado por los comerciantes para vender su mercadera a un muy bajo costo) y se ubico como comerciante informal. En la actualidad trabaja sola en diferentes horarios vendiendo juguetes, ropa a las personas que asisten a la Baha.
Uno de sus objetivos es seguir vendiendo mercadera para asegurar el futuro de su hijo por eso quiere comprar juguetes y ropa. En el futuro quiere mejorar su casa y darle un buen futuro a su hija.
texts.en:
Aracely, 27, has a 10 year old daughter and is separated from her husband. That didnt stop her from being an enterprising woman, though, and start earning her own income selling clothing as an informal merchant.
She currently lives in a periurban area, called Paraso, where she worked for many years selling clothes. She had the opportunity to have a place in La Baha (a place used by merchants to sell their merchandise at very low cost) and she set herself up there as an informal merchant. Currently she works alone at various schedules selling toys and clothes to people who frequent La Baha.
One of her objectives is to continue selling merchandise to assure her childs future. This is why she wants to buy toys and clothes. In the future shed like to make some home improvements and provide a good future for her daughter.

loan.use: For toys and clothes.

loan.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua A. is married and has four children. Her husband is a carpenter. She has received junior high education. Ekua cooks banku and serves it with okra and pepper sauce at Abura, which she has been doing for twenty years. Ekua uses her income to assist her husband in taking care of her family. She is going to use the loan she hopes to receive to buy bags of maize to prepare banku and to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Ekua plans to put up a structure where her customers can eat.

loan.use: To buy bags of maize to prepare banku and to sell.

loan.name: Abena

texts.en: Abena K. is married and has six dependents. Her husband is a plumber. She has been through junior high school. She sells biscuits, slippers, soft drinks and other items at Abura. Abena uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. She will use the loan to purchase more of groceries for resale. Abena hopes to reinvest her new profits.

loan.use: To purchase more of groceries for resale.

loan.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nancy; ella tiene 42 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de colchas, cubrecamas y sabanas y tambin se dedica a la venta de ropa en general, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria e independiente, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener una tienda para que pueda vender cubrecamas y sabanas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nancy, 42, is a member of the SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA communal bank which is located in Urubamba in Urubamba province, Cusco department.
She is single and has four children. She alternates her daily chores with a business selling comforters, bed spreads and sheets. She also sells clothing in general. She sells both independently and as a street vendor. Through this business she is able to help her children get ahead. She wants to have a store where she can sell bed spreads and sheets. She is asking for the loan to buy merchandise.
She is happy for the loan and commits to repay her installments.

loan.use: To buy merchandise.

loan.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba A. sells maize at Abura. Aba has received a senior high education. She is married and has six dependants. Her husband is a farmer. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy additional bags of maize for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loan.use: To buy additional bags of maize

loan.name: Joaqun

texts.es:
Joaqun N. Q. tiene 58 aos. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 3 hijos, todos mayores de edad.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Joaqun se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, chocho y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es mejorar la vivienda y tener una vida tranquila.
Le gusta salir a pasear y celebrar la fiesta del Seor Jess del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Joaqun N. Q. is 58 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolvar. He has three children, all of whom are adults.
The members of the community bank "Jesus del Gran Poder" meet in the community of San Ramn in the canton of Chillanes, 35 minutes from the Chillanes office. The members of this group all work in agriculture.
Joaqun works in agriculture planting corn and a variety of beans. He buys and sells in the market in the Chillanes canton on Sundays.
He is asking for this loan to purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizers so he will have a good quality crop. The support of the loan will help financially meet his needs. He confronts challenges like plagues, sickness, and weather changes. His dream is to improve his home and have a calm life.
He likes to take walks and celebrate the feast of Seor Jess del Gran Poder.

loan.use: Purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizer

loan.name: Nana Ekua

texts.en: Nana Ekua T. is married and has two children. Her husband is a chain saw operator. She has been through senior high school. Nana cooks banku to sell. She also sells gari, canned tomatoes, groundnuts and sugar at Abura. Nana assists her husband with the basic needs of the family. Nana will use the loan to buy more foodstuffs to sell and other ingredients to cook banku to sell to expand her business. With the new profits from her expanded business, Nana plans to build a shop.

loan.use: To buy more foodstuffs to sell

loan.name: Mariano Victoriano

texts.es:
Mariano Victoriano P. S. tiene 85 aos. Es soltero, vive solo, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. No tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Mariano se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener una vida sin tantas necesidades.
Le gusta descansar y bailar en las fiestas del Seor Jess del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Mariano Victoriano P. S. is 85 years old, single, and lives alone in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolvar. He does not have children.
The members of the community bank "Jesus del Gran Poder" meet in the community of San Ramn, located in the canton of Chillanes about 35 minutes from the Chillanes office. The members of this group all work in agriculture.
Mariano works in agriculture planting corn and beans. He buys and sells in the market in Chillanes canton on Sundays.
He is asking for this loan to purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizer so he will have a good quality crop. This loan will help him meet his needs financially. He confronts challenges like plagues, sickness, and weather changes. His dream is to have a life without so many necessities.
He likes to relax and dance at the feasts of Seor Jess del Gran Poder

loan.use: Purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizers

loan.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Eduarda; ella tiene 39 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, ella tiene una heladera que vende en las calles de la ciudad de Urubamba,la socia tiene varios carritos que trabajan vendiendo helados en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de helados. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los helados y tambin para comprar un carrito heladero.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eduarda, 39, is a member of the SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA communal bank located in Urubamba, Urubamba province, Cusco department.
She is married and has three children. She alternates her daily chores with ice cream sales. She has an ice cream shop and sells throughout Urubambas streets. He has several little carts that work selling ice cream and he wants to expand the business. She is asking for a loan to buy ice cream making ingredients and also to buy an ice cream cart.
She is happy for the loan and commits to repay.

loan.use: To buy ice cream making ingredients and also to buy an ice cream cart.

loan.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua N. sells cooked rice. She also sells bagged gari, groundnuts and sugar at Abura. She is divorced and has three children. She sees to the well-being of her home. Her loan will be used to buy ingredients to cook for sale to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a shop. Efua has displayed the bagged items on the table for sale.

loan.use: To buy ingredients to cook for sale

loan.name: Luis Octavio

texts.es:
Luis Octavio C. Y. tiene 52 aos. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 4 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar la mejor educacin a los hijos.
Le gusta descansar, bailar en las fiestas del Seor Jess del Gran Poder y visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Luis Octavio C. Y., 52, is married living with his wife and children in Chillanes canton, Bolvar province. He has four children.
The JESUS DEL GRAN PODER communal bank is located in San Ramn which is in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Chillanes office. The members of this communal bank are exclusively farmers.
Luis is a corn and broad bean farmer. His purchases and sales both occur in Chillanes canton during the Sunday market.
He is asking for a loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizers so that his crops will be of good quality. The loans support will help him economically to meet his needs. They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations. His dream is to provide his children with the best education.
He likes to relax and dance at the Seor Jess del Gran Poder feasts and to visit the family.

loan.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizers.

loan.name: Akouvi Fostine

texts.fr: Fostine est marie et ge de 38 ans. Elle a un enfant. Elle fait le commerce de pagne pour pouvoir amliorer les conditions de vie de son enfant. En effet, elle exerce cette activit il y a de cela 10 ans et sapprovisionne au grand march de Lom.Elle redistribue ensuite au march local adidogom. Elle est ne Tsvie et habite adidogom. Elle espre acheter avec le nouveau crdit 10 pices de pagnes phoenis et 15 pices de pagnes hitarget.
texts.en: Fostine is married and 38 years old. She has one child. She sells "pagnes" (pieces of colourful West African fabric) in order to improve her child's living conditions. She has in fact been carrying out this business for ten years and gets her supplies at the large market in Lom. She redistributes them afterwards at the local market in Adidogom. She was born in Tsvie and lives in Adidogom. She hopes to buy ten "Phoenix pagnes" and 15 "Hitarget pagnes" with the new loan.

loan.use: Purchase of "pagnes"

loan.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Juana Francisca; ella tiene 46 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella vende diferentes tipos de comida y tambin vende gaseosas y cervezas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para cocinar y gaseosas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Senora Juana Francisca belongs to the "San Jos de Urubamba" communal bank, which is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, in the Cuzco region.
Senora Juana Francisca is 46 years old, single, and has a son. She combines her daily activities with running a restaurant, where she sells different types of food and also sodas and beers. She works from 8am to 7pm. She wants to improve and expand her restaurant, and is seeking the loan to buy hings for cooking and sodas, which she will buy wholesale.
She is happy that she can access the loan and promises to complete her repayments on time.

loan.use: The member of this communal bank is seeking a loan to buy things for cooking, and sodas which she will buy wholesale.

loan.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba S. is married and has six dependents. Aba has received senior high school education. Her husband is an electrician. Aba cooks banku (a dish made with maize flour) at Abura for sale. Aba has been preparing banku for sale for five years. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy more maize flour in order to expand her business. Aba hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loan.use: To buy more maize flour.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy ingredients for preparing his dishes.

loan.name: Zenobia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Zenobia; ella tiene 61 aos. La socia es soltera, y tiene 01 hijo; la socia se dedica a la venta de comidas, ella trabaja en el mercado de arco pata, ella educa a su hijo y desea lo mejor para l es por eso que ao tras ao se dedica a trabajar arduamente y ella elabora comidas caseras y vende en un stand pre fabricado por ella misma. La socia desea comprar al por mayor los insumos tales como azcar, arroz, harinas, aceite y otros. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar insumos y elaborar sus comiditas.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Senora Zenobia is a member of a communal bank called "Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco" ("New Dawn of Cuzco"). The communal bank is located in thee district of Huanchac, in the province and department of Cuzco.
Senora Zenobia is 61 years old. She is single, and has a son. She dedicates her time to the sale of food, working in the Arco Pata market. She educates her son and wants the best for him: for this reason she works hard, year after year, making homemade dishes and selling them at a stall specially built for the purpose. She wants to buy staple ingredients such as sugar, rice, flour, cooking oil, and other things. She is seeking the loan to buy ingredients and make her dishes.
She is happy to be eligible for the loan and promises to complete her repayments on time and in the proper place.

loan.use: The member of this communal bank is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for her dishes.

loan.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario M. P. tiene 39 aos. Es soltera, vive con la madre, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. No tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Rosario se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es seguir trabajando y tener una vida mas tranquila.
Le gusta festejar las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Rosario M. P. is 39 years old. She is single and lives with her mother in the settlement of Chillanes, in Bolvar Province. She has no children.
The members of the "Jesus del Gran Poder" communal bank are from the San Ramn community in Chillanes, located around 35 minutes from the office [of the field partner] there. All the members of the bank work in agriculture.
Rosario dedicates her time to growing corn and beans. She buys and sells in Chillanes in the market on Sundays.
She is seeking the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers so that her crop is of high quality. The loan will help her financially, to afford what she needs. She faces challenges such as infestations, crop diseases and the variability of the climate. Her dream is to continue working and to have a life with fewer worries.
She likes to celebrate local festivities.

loan.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers

loan.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Leonardo; el tiene 54 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, el juntamente con su esposa trabajan en este negocio de venta de helados que venden en las calles de la ciudad de Urubamba, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar una mquina para hacer los helados.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Senor Leonardo belongs to the to the "San Jos de Urubamba" communal bank, which is located in the Urubamba district and province, in the Cuzco region.
Senor Leonardo is 54 years old, and is married with 3 children. He combines his daily activities with running a business selling icecream, together with his wife. They sell their icecream in the streets in the city of Urubamba, and he wants to expand and improve his operation. He his seeking a loan to buy a machine for making the icecream.
He is happy that he can access the loan and promises to complete his repayments on time.

loan.use: To buy a machine to make icecreams

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy calves.

loan.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel L. Q. tiene 70 aos. Es casado, vive con la esposa, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 hijos, todos son casados.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar la educacin a los hijos para que sean profesionales y tener buena salud para seguir trabajando.
Le gusta descansar y bailar en las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Manuel L. Q., 70, is married living with his wife in Chillanes canton, Bolvar province. He has five children, all now married.
The JESUS DEL GRAN PODER communal bank is in San Ramn which is located in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Chillanes Office. All the members of this communal bank are farmers.
Manuel is a corn and broad bean farmer. His purchases and sales both take place at the Chillanes Canton Market on Sundays.
He is asking for a loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizer so that his crop will be of good quality. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations. His dream is to provide education for his children so that they will be professionals and to have good health to continue working.
He enjoys relaxing and dancing at the local fiestas.

loan.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizer.

loan.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina tiene 35 aos, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo en una casa alquilada. Hace ms de 4 aos se dedica a preparar comida que son expendidos a los trabajadores de una empresa publica que la acogi a ella y a su familia. La cantidad de comida que elabora va de acuerdo a la cantidad de pedidos que le hacen sus comensales. Desde entonces vende alimentos para el desayuno y almuerzo. Ella manifiesta estar contenta con su trabajo, ya que sus clientes disfrutan de su sazn y nunca dejan de hacer algn pedido, generndole as mas rentas asimismo puede atender a sus hijos con las tareas escolares. En un futuro tiene el anhelo de tener un restaurante. Es su crdito nmero 2 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que sern gestoras del prstamo que solicita ya que le ser muy til en el progreso de su actividad econmica. Con el crdito que solicita, lo invertir en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor.
texts.en:
Karina, 35, lives with her two children and husband in a rented house. For over four years she has been preparing meals that are sold to employees of a public firm that welcomed her and her family. The amount of food she prepares depends on the number of orders her diners place. Since then she has sold breakfasts and lunches. She states that she is happy with her work because her customers enjoy her tasty preparations and always place orders thus generating more profits for her. At the same time, she is able to care for her children and help them with their school work. In the future shed like to have a restaurant.
This is her second loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial help. Besides, she enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.
She is grateful to all the people who will fund the loan shes requesting because it will be very useful for her business progress.
She will use the requested loan to buy ingredients at wholesale.

loan.use: To buy ingredients for her meals preparation.

loan.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto M. S. tiene 36 aos. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 3 hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es construir una casa y dar el estudio a los hijos.
Le gusta salir de paseo con la familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto M. S., 36, is married living with his wife and children in Chillanes canton, Bolvar province. He has three children.
The JESUS DEL GRAN PODER communal bank is in San Ramn which is located in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Office in Chillanes. The members of this communal bank are all farmers.
Carlos is a corn and broad bean farmer. His purchases and sales both occur in the Chillanes canton market on Sundays.
He is asking for the loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizer so that his crops will be of good quality. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations. His dream is to build a house and provide an education for his children.
He enjoys family excursions.

loan.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizer.

loan.name: Nuris Isabel

texts.es: La seora Nuris C. S. es una alegre mujer que vive en Cartagena en compaa de su esposo y tres hijos. Tiene un pequeo saln de belleza en el cual ofrece el servicio de peinados, corte, tintes y planchado de cabello. Este oficio lo aprendi de manera emprica hace varios aos con sus hermanas menores y luego perfeccion sus tcnicas con varios cursos en academias de educacin tcnica en Cartagena. Al principio la microempresaria slo atenda a su crculo de amigos y familiares cercanos, pero con el paso del tiempo, su clientela fue creciendo y empez a comprar herramientas y accesorios profesionales. Ella tambin vende carne de res en horas de la maana a vecinos y amigos del barrio a quienes les acredita el producto para que le cancelen semanal o quincenalmente. Este es el segundo crdito que tramita con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo y su primer Credikiva que planea invertir en la remodelacin del piso de la sala donde funciona el saln de belleza y comprar ms carne de res. Entre los dos negocios la usuaria obtiene una utilidad mensual aproximada de $700.000. Ella suea con instalar un gran saln de esttica en un lugar diferente a su residencia, con aire acondicionado y otras comodidades que le permitan ofrecer un mejor servicio. La mayor satisfaccin que le genera el negocio a la seora Nuris es generar unos importantes ingresos que ayudan al sostenimiento del hogar y especialmente poder atender la educacin y los tratamientos mdicos de una hija discapacitada.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nuris C. S. is a cheerful woman living in Cartagena with her husband and three children. She has a small beauty salon where she offers hair styling, haircuts, hair coloring and hair straightening. She learned this occupation empirically several years ago with her younger sisters and then perfected her techniques through several courses at technical education academies in Cartagena.
At the beginning she only took care of a small circle of friends and close family members at her micro business. But with the passage of time, her clientele grew and she started buying tools and professional accessories.
She also sells beef during the morning to friends and neighbors in the neighborhood. She sells it to them on credit and they repay weekly or biweekly.
This is the second loan she has negotiated with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo and her first Kiva loan. She plans to use it to remodel the floor in the room where her beauty salon operates and to buy more beef.
The two businesses together produce a monthly profit of approximately $700.000. She dreams with setting up a great beauty salon in a different part of her residence with air conditioning and other comforts that will make it possible for her to offer better service.
Most of the satisfaction that the business generates for Nuris is in generating important income that helps support the household especially for the education and medical treatment of a handicapped daughter.

loan.use: To remodel the floor the living room where the beauty salon operates and to buy more beef.

loan.name: Lus Alfredo

texts.es:
Lus Alfredo L. C. tiene 21 aos. Vive en Unin Libre, vive con la compaera y con el hijo, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene un hijo de 10 meses de edad.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Lus se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener terrenos propios y una casa.
Le gusta hacer deporte, estudiar, salir de paseo festejar las fiestas de carnaval, navidad y del seor del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Lus Alfredo L. C. is 21 years old, is in a live-in relationship, and has one ten month old son. He lives in the Chillanes hamlet, located in the Bolvar province. The members of the V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, located in the San Ramn community, of Chillanes, are exclusively farmers.
Lus raises corn and beans and makes his sales and purchases at the Sunday fairs in Chillanes.
He is asking for this loan in order to buy seed and fertilizers so that he can increase his production. This loan will aid him financially and allow him to cover his requirements. He faces challenges, such as blights, plant diseases, and changes in the weather. His dreams are to have his own house and land.
He likes to play sports, study, go for walks, attend carnivals, Christmas festivals, and the festival of seor del Gran Poder.

loan.use: comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes

loan.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia E. de 56 aos de edad, reside en Ilopango, en el departamento de San Salvador. Vive junto a su esposo, un hijo y un nieto de 3 aos de edad. Virginia es una persona muy trabajadora la cual se dedica a mltiples actividades para poder obtener mayores ganancias, ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos, as tambin posee una venta de frutas y verduras, sus negocios estn ubicados en su propia casa de habitacin. Con su enorme esfuerzo por obtener el bienestar de su familia, Virginia demuestra ser una mujer muy luchadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante junto a su familia, es por esto que solicita un prstamo con el fin de poder contar con el dinero necesario para comprar productos alimenticios y de primera necesidad para surtir la tienda, negocio el cual le trae mayores ganancias, ya que posee muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Virginia E., age 56, lives in Ilopango in the San Salvador department. She lives with her husband, a son, and a three year old grandson. Virginia is a very hard-working person who devotes herself to multiple activities to be able to get greater income.
She has a store where she sells perishable products. She also has a business selling fruit and vegetables. Both of her businesses are located in her own house. With an enormous amount of effort on behalf of her familys well-being, Virginia has shown herself to be a very tenacious woman with a lot of desire to get ahead with her family.
That is why she is requesting a loan to be able to have the money she needs to buy food products and basic needs items to stock her store. The business brings greater income because she has many customers.

loan.use: To buy basic needs products

loan.name: Jos Ricardo

texts.es: Jos Ricardo D. M. de 24 aos de edad, reside en El Calvario, ubicado en el departamento de Usulutn, el es un joven muy responsable, quien le ayuda a su madre con los gastos del hogar, ya que ellos dos viven juntos, por lo que se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante. Jos posee un saln de belleza en su casa de habitacin, l posee cinco aos de experiencia, tiempo en el que ha ido obteniendo clientes fieles gracias a su excelente trabajo y servicio brindando. Jos solicita un prstamo ya que cuenta con el deseo de mejorar las condiciones de su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de productos profesionales para el cuidado del cabello, as mismo cremas para cuerpo y rostro y otros tipos de tratamiento para el cuidado de la imagen de las personas. Jos suea con poseer un negocio an ms surtido en donde posea la capacidad para atender ms clientes.
texts.en:
Jos Ricardo D. M., age 24, lives in El Calvario in the Usulutn department. He is a very responsible young man who helps his mother with the household expenses. They live together and mutually support each other in order to get ahead.
Jos has a beauty salon at his house, and he has five years of experience. During that time he has acquired loyal customers thanks to his excellent work and the service he provides.
Jos is requesting a loan because his wishes to improve his business conditions. He will buy a greater quantity of professional hair care products. He will also buy body and face creams and other types of treatments for taking care of a persons appearance.
Jos dreams of having a business that is even better stocked where he has the capacity to take care of more customers.

loan.use: To buy beauty products

loan.name: Arabella Noemi

texts.es:
Arabella Noemi V. O. tiene 21 aos. Vive en Union Libre, vive con la compaera y con el hijo, vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 1 hijo de 10 meses de edad.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramn esta ubicada en el cantn Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.
Arabella se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y frjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantn Chillanes en la feria de los das Domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la produccin sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener casa propia.
Le gusta salir a pasear en el pueblo.
texts.en:
Arabella Noemi V. O. is 21 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage. She lives with her life partner and her son in the Chillanes canton in the Bolivr province. Her son is ten months old.
The members of the Jesus del Gran Poder Communal Bank are located in the San Ramn community in the Chillanes canton. They are 35 minutes from the Chillanes office. The members of this communal bank devote themselves exclusively to farming.
Arabella grows corn and broad beans. She makes her purchases and sales at the Sunday fair in the Chillanes canton.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds and organic and chemical fertilizers in order to have a quality production. The support of the loan will help her financially with her necessities. They face challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and the climate changes.
Her dream is to have her own house. She likes to take walks in the town.

loan.use: To buy seeds and natural and chemical fertilizers

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy calves to fatten

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy pigs to raise and sell

loan.name: Flor Yolanda

texts.es: Flor Yolanda R. A., reside en Sensuntepeque, en el departamento de Cabaas, en donde vive junto a su madre la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y as mismo vive junto a 3 hijos menores de edad. Flor posee una venta de tortillas en el mercado regional de Sensuntepeque, en donde ha trabajado durante 4 aos, razn por la que es muy conocida por la mayora de personas, y as mismo cuenta con varios clientes fijos quienes compran su productos a diario. Flor es la nica que trabaja en su hogar, por lo que debe esforzarse mucho por sostener a su madre y tres hijos los cuales dependen por completo de ella. Flor solicita un prstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maz por mayor, ya que desea preveer las alzas de este para el nuevo ao, por lo que espera aumentar su materia prima y de esta forma seguir brindando un excelente servicio.
texts.en:
Flor Yolanda R. A. resides in Sensuntepeque, in the Cabaas region. She lives with her mother, who dedicates herself to running the home, and also with her three school-age children.
Flor has a place for selling tortillas in the Sensuntepeque regional market, where she has worked for 4 years. It is a good location because it is well known to most people, and there are also regular customer who buy her produce every day. Flor is the only one in her household who works, and so she must work hard to sustain her mother and three children, who depend upon her for everything. Flor is seeking the loan to buy corn in bulk, so she can avoid the effects of the price rises she expects to see in the new year. With it she hopes to increase her stock of her raw material (the corn) and in this way continue offering an excellent service.

loan.use: To buy corn for making tortillas

loan.name: Zoryana

texts.en:
Zoryana is a market entrepreneur from Novomoskovsk. She sells household supplies and fishing items in the central marketplace of her home town. She is an entrepreneur of determination and focus. She has been working in this sphere of trade for over 10 years. Currently, she makes over 6,000 Grivnyas of net profit each month.
Zoryana is seeking a loan of 11,300 Grivnyas to purchase additional merchandise and to re-stock her inventory. She likes working with this type of merchandise even though many think it is strange thatshe sells mens fishing supplies along with other items like knives, axes and blades. Zoryana is hoping to continue growing her business in the future.

loan.use: To purchase merchandise for sale.

loan.name: Jos Octavio

texts.es: Jos Octavio A., es un padre de familia muy responsable, quien trabaja muy duro por sacar adelante a su familia, con quien reside en el municipio de Ilopango, en el departamento de Cabaas. Jos posee su propio negocio en el cual se dedica a la elaboracin de estructuras metlicas como: puertas, balcones, portones y otros ms. l elabora un excelente trabajo, ya que es muy dedicado a lo que realiza, por lo que las personas lo prefieren para realizar sus trabajo. Jos solicita un prstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar hierro y de esta forma realizar ms estructuras metlicas, muchas de las cuales no puede hacer por falta de materia prima. De esta manera Jos espera obtener mayores ganancias las cuales sean de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
Jos Octavio A. is a very responsible man, and the father of a family. He works very hard to bring up his family, who he lives with in the toen of Ilopango, in the Cabaas region. Jos has his own business, making metal structures such as gates, balconies, doors and other things. He does excellent work, because he is very dedicated to what he does. For that reason people choose to come to him to make the items they need.
Jos is seeking a loan to buy iron and be able to make more metal structures, because there are many things he cannot make for lack of raw material. In this way Jos hopes to increase his earnings, which will benefit his family greatly.

loan.use: To buy iron for making metal structures

loan.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is married with 2 children. He is a manager in a small firm from Stryi. His company offers energy efficient and made-to-offer doors and windows for both construction and replacement. Roman doesnt only sell the items but also offers installation services to clients. Romans pay is about 2,000 Grivnyas a month.
Roman owns a vehicle that he uses for both business and personal purposes. He is seeking a loan of 3,000 Grivnyas to do much needed repairs of the vehicle. The family has had the car for awhile and now it needs some repair work. Roman can be characterized as a focused businessman and a wise steward of his finances.

loan.use: To do repairs on his vehicle

loan.name: Unidos Por El Triunfo Group

texts.es: Hersilia tiene 60 aos D. edad es socia D. la Alcanca Comunal Unidos por el Triunfo desD. hace tres aos. Ella se dedica a elaborar manualidades como son bolsos en macram, muecas y tambin hace un poco D. costura, todos estos objetos los ofrece ella misma, adems D. saber tejidos en macram est estudiando manualidades en cuero para lo cual solicito un prstamo a EDAPROSPO e invertir en materiales para elaborar carteras en cuero. El sueo D. Hersilia es que su ltimo hijo termine la universidad y terminar D. construir su casa.
texts.en: Hersilia is 60 years old. She has been a member of the 'Unidos por el Triunfo' (United for Victory) community bank for three years. She makes handicrafts such as macram bags, dolls and she also does a little sewing. She sells all of these objects herself. As well as knowing how to make macram products, she is also studying how to make leather handicrafts. She is requesting a loan from EDAPROSPO to invest in buying materials for making leather purses. Hersilia's dream is for her youngest child to finish university and to finish building her house.

loan.use: Material (leather) for making purses

loan.name: Haydee Crisabel

texts.es: Haydee Crisabel A. C. es una persona muy esforzada, quien trabaja muy duro por el bienestar de su nica hija de 5 aos de edad, Haydee vive junto a ella en el municipio de Sensuntepeque en el departamento de Cabaas. Haydee se dedica a la venta de ropa para nios, y adultos, la cual comercializa en el mercado regional de Sensuntepeque, un mercado bastante grande que cuenta con una gran afluencia de personas. Ella es una madre de familia muy esforzada quien desea mucho que si hija tenga una vida mejor, razn por la que solicita un prstamo por medio del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en ms ropa y de esta manera aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Haydee Crisabel A. C. is a very hard-working person who works hard for the well-being of her only daughter who is 5 years old. She lives with her daughter in the town of Sensuntepeque, in Cabaas department.
Haydee sells children's and adults' clothes in Sensuntepeque regional market. This is a large and very busy market. Haydee is a very hard-working mother who wishes very much for her daughter to enjoy a better life. She is requesting this loan so that she will have the money she needs to invest in buying more clothes so that she can increase her sales.

loan.use: To buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Mara Elia

texts.es: Mara Elia F., reside en el municipio de Sensuntepeque en el departamento de Cabaas, lugar en el cual vive junto a su hijo de 9 aos de edad. Mara es madre soltera, por lo que trabaja el doble para poder sostener su hogar y a su hijo. Ella se dedica a vender ropa, en su propio negocio el cual esta ubicado en el mercado de Sensuntepeque en donde posee un negocio bastante grande y surtido. Mara solicita un prstamo a travs del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa, en diferentes tallas y colores, esto lo hace con el deseo de poder obtener mayor cantidad de clientes y as percibir ms ganancias, lo cual es muy importante para ella, debido a que es la nica fuente de ingresos que posee para sostener su hogar.
texts.en:
Mara Elia F. lives in the town of Sensuntepeque, in Cabaas department together with her 9 year-old son. Mara is a single mother which means that she works doubly hard to support her household and her son. She sells clothes in her own business which is located in Sensuntepeque market. Her business is quite large and well stocked.
Mara is requesting a loan so that she can buy a larger quantity of clothes, in different sizes and colors. This way, she hopes to be able to attract more customers and thereby make more profits. This is very important to her since her business is the only source of income that she has with which to support her household.

loan.use: To buy clothes wholesale

loan.name: Mara Clementina

texts.es: Mara Clementina B., es una joven madre de un pequeo de 8 aos de edad, con quien vive en Sensuntepeque, departamento de Cabaas, as mismo vive junto a su madre la cual le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Mara posee una cafetera en la que comercializa productos alimenticios como: desayunos y almuerzos, as mismo vende bebidas y golosinas, su negocio se encuentra en el punto de microbuses de la ruta 12, en donde comercializa sus productos con motoristas y usuarios del transporte pblico. Mara desea aumentar la cantidad de productos para comercializar, y as de esta manera aumentar sus ventas lo cual es su principal objetivo.
texts.en: Mara Clementina B. is the young mother of an 8 year old. She lives in Sensuntepeque, in Cabaas department, with her mother who helps her with the household expenses. Mara owns a caf in which she sells food such as breakfasts and lunches. She also sells soft drinks and candy. Her business is located at the bus stop for route 12 minibuses. She sells her products to motorists and public transport users. Mara would like to increase the quantity of products she sells and thereby increase her sales which is her main goal.

loan.use: To buy perishables to sell

loan.name: Mara Gloria Ascensin

texts.es: Mara Gloria Ascensin P. D. de 43 aos, vive junto a sus tres hijos y una sobrina, junto a los cuales reside en el municipio de Sensuntepeque. Mara posee una venta de productos plsticos, ropa interior, y en esta temporada tambin surte su negocio con productos navideos. Mara es una persona muy responsable en su hogar ya que es la nica que trabaja por sostenerlo, ella solicita un prstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de plsticos como: depsitos para el agua, botellas, platos y otros ms, los cuales se venden durante todo el ao. De esta manera ella espera mejorar sus ganancias y darles una vida mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: Mara Gloria Ascensin P. D. is 43 years old. She lives together with her three children and a niece in the town of Sensuntepeque. Mara has a business selling plastic products, underwear and, during the current season, she also stocks her business with Christmas products. Mara is a very responsible person within her household as she is the only one who works to support it. She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of plastic products such as: water containers, bottles, plates and other products. She sells these products all year round. In this way, she hopes to improve her profits and provide her children with a better life.

loan.use: To buy plastic products to sell

loan.name: Gregoria

texts.es: La seora Gregoria C. O. se dedica a la cra de ganado vacuno hace tres aos atrs , tiene tres vacas de las cuales ella se ocupa de cuidarlas , alimentarlas, su esposo trabaja de albail por su zona, ellos logran verse solamente en las noches ya que todo el da esta fuera y tiene poco tiempo para poder ver a sus hijos que son 2 pequeos que an no van a la escuela , estos seores tienen bajos recursos, viven en una casa muy precaria, en la zona de Sipe Sipe a casi 22 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba; ellos solicitaron un crdito y poder comprar una vaca lechera , que les dar la posibilidad de tener un poco ms de ingresos para la alimentacin de sus hijos y la posibilidad de hacer crecer su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
