loan.use: To buy spare parts and accessories

loan.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon S.s family farms and raises cattle. Although everyone in the family works very hard, the households income needs to increase, particularly to help the family get through the cold winter. Simon is planning to increase the livestock to expand his small farm.

loan.use: Expand his livestock business

loan.name: Daina Pura

texts.es: La Sra. Daina vive en la zona del plan 3000, es casa propia donde vive junto a sus hijos y su esposo. La Sra. Daina es cliente antigua en la institucin, ella estuvo en el banco de emprendimiento Paraso donde ella demostr buen comportamiento de pago, el banco de emprendimiento Paraso de cerro por dificultades de pago de otras 3 socias, por ese motivo la Sra. Solicito un crdito individual. La Sra. Se dedica a la venta de .colchas polar, edredones sabanas, cubrecamas, el crdito que esta solicitando es para comprar mas mercadera por las fiestas de fin de ao donde tiene una gran demanda, tambin realiza viajes a la poblacin de tres cruces donde tiene clientes. La Sra. Dania es responsable, trabajadora y quiere mejorar sus ingresos para seguir superndose.
texts.en:
Daina lives in Plan 3000 neighborhood. She lives in her own home together with her children and her husband.
Daina is a long-standing client of our institution. She used to be a member of the Paraso community bank where she had a good loan repayment history. The Paraso community bank closed because three of its other members had problems paying back their loans. For this reason, Daina is currently requesting an individual loan.
Daina sells fleece bedspreads, quilts and sheets. She will use her loan to buy more merchandise for the end-of-year holiday season when there is a lot of demand. Daina also makes trips to the town of Tres Cruces where she has customers. She is a responsible, hard-working lady who would like to improve her income so that she can continue to better herself.

loan.use: To buy bedspreads, quilts and sheets

loan.name: Maria

texts.es:
Mara C. Gonzlez tiene 28 aos de edad, vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposo, en una zona de Alajuela que ha sido apoyada por instituciones como el Instituto Mixto de Ayuda Social, para mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas. Hace 7 aos y por iniciativa propia, comenz en el comercio vendiendo ropa y otros artculos, con el lapso de los aos y gracias al esfuerzo de ella ha crecido, atendiendo otras necesidades de sus clientes, incursionando en la compra de electrodomsticos trados desde el puerto libre de Golfito.
Su principal prioridad es apoyar a sus hijos en el estudio; al mismo tiempo ella est llevando los cursos para obtener su ttulo de la secundaria a distancia; acaba de aprobar el stimo ao. Esto le ha ayudado a mejorar en su negocio y espera en el corto plazo obtener el bachillerato. Este es su primer crdito y lleg a Fundacin Mujer por referencia de una amiga que escuch la informacin en un programa de radio.
Ella inici su actividad con un prstamo por 25000 colones que su ta le otorg. Con este adquiri ropa intima y as inici su negocio. Le ha ido dando vuelta al capital y diversificando su oferta de productos a sus clientes, actualmente realiza ventas por catlogo y va a Golfito a comprar electrodomsticos, los cuales vende a pagos.
Una vez realizado el estudio de crdito y verificado las diferentes actividades a las que se dedica la clienta demuestra la capacidad para cubrir la cuota en el plazo establecido. Adems con esta inversin se va a ir a Panam donde se va a comprar mercadera (ropa principalmente) a un muy buen precio, fortaleciendo as su capital de trabajo para sus otras actividades.
La clienta tiene un pequeo local en su casa en donde mantiene un pequeo inventario de productos y atiende por las maanas, despus de haber enviado a sus hijos a la escuela, por las tardes realiza exhibiciones en localidades cercanas lo que le ha ayudado a aumentar su clientela, brinda facilidades de pago. Es una actividad que apoya los ingresos del hogar que se complementan con el trabajo de su esposo. Por las noches se dedica a estudiar.
texts.en:
Mara C. Gonzlez is 28 years old. She lives with her two children and her husband in an area of Alajuela that has been supported by institutions such as the 'Instituto Mixto de Ayuda Social' with the goal of improving residents' quality of life. Seven years ago, under her own initiative, Mara set up her business selling clothes and other articles. Over the years and thanks to her own hard work, she has grown in her business, meeting other needs of her customers, buying electrical appliances from Golfito free port.
Mara's main priority is to support her children in their studies. At the same time, Mara herself is taking some distance-learning courses so that she can finish her high school education. She has just passed her seventh year. This has helped her to improve her business and she hopes, in the short term, that she will be able to obtain her high school diploma. This is Mara's first loan. A friend recommended that she approach Fundacin Mujer when she heard about the institution on a radio program.
Mara started her business with a loan of 25,000 colones that she received from her aunt. With this money she bought underwear and set up her business. Her capital has gone around and she has diversified the range of products that she offers to her customers. She currently makes catalog sales and travels to Golfito to buy electrical appliances which she sells on credit.
We have performed a credit report on the client and verified the different business activities that she carries out. She shows the ability to make her repayments on time. She is also planning to use her loan money to travel to Panama where she will buy merchandise (mainly clothes) at a very good price, thereby strengthening her working capital for other activities.
Mara has small premises in her home where she keeps a small inventory of products. She works there in the mornings after having got her children ready for school. In the afternoons, she displays her products in nearby towns which has helped her to increase her customer base. She provides her customers with credit facilities. Mara's activities support her household financially, together with the money her husband makes from his work. In the evenings, Mara studies

loan.use: To buy clothes

loan.name: Jhojan Antonio

texts.es: El Joven Jhojan se dedica a la compra y venta de tarjetas para recarga de crdito para celulares, ya cuenta con clientela pero debido a que encontr mas clientela el capital con que esta trabajando ya no le es suficiente motivo por el cual solicita el crdito para incrementar su capital de trabajo, se dedica a esta actividad hace un ao durante el cual ya pudo acumular un buen capital, jhojan es soltero y se solventa sus estudios con la venta de tarjetas, aun vive en domicilio de propiedad de sus padres quienes ven con agrado que su hijo aun contine estudiando pese al trabajo que implica la venta de las tarjetas, el joven esta agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Young Jhojan buys and sells pre-paid cell phone cards. He already has a regular customer base but he has attracted more customers which means that the capital with which he is working isn't enough. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to increase his working capital. He has been in this business for one year during which time he has made good money.
Jhojan is single and covering his studies with his card sales business. He still lives in his parents' home. His parents are very happy that their son is continuing with his studies in spite of the work that his card sales business entails. He is very grateful to the institution for the support he is receiving.

loan.use: Working capital to buy phone cards

loan.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Maria; ella tiene 46 aos. La socia es soltera, y tiene 01 hijo; la socia se dedica a la administracin de su tienda de abarrotes ella desea implementar el dinero y comprar mercadera para surtir su tienda, ella tambin deber terminar de pagar parte de la mercadera que adquiri en el mes de noviembre como panetones, vinos, champan, chocolates para la poca navidea, actualmente la socia nos indica que le est yendo muy bien que est vendiendo sus panetones y las pastas de chocolate, ella tiene buenas expectativas con respecto a la poca navidea y el ao nuevo, la socia nos indica que el ao pasado vendi panetones hasta el mes de marzo de este ao entonces no se apura en vender todos solo en esta fecha. La socia solicita el prstamo para surtir mercadera y pagar una ltima cuota de los panetones.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the "Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.
Maria is 46 years old. She is single and has one child. Her business is running her grocery store. She would like to use her loan money to buy merchandise so that she can stock her store. She must also finish paying for some of the merchandise that she acquired in the month of November such as panettones, wine, champagne and chocolates for the Christmas season.
Maria tells us that currently her business is doing very well and that she is managing to sell her panettones and chocolates. She is confident with respect to the Christmas season and the New Year. She tells us that last year she sold panettones up until the month of March so she is not worried about selling them all right now.
Maria is requesting this loan to stock her store with merchandise and to meet the last repayment on her panettone purchase. She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loan.use: To stock her store with merchandise and to make her final repayment on her panettone purchase

loan.name: Sonya

texts.en:
Sonya S. was a math teacher. She is a mother and grandmother of three. Because a teachers salary in Armenia is extremely low, Sonya had to undertake a trade to help her family survive after her husbands death. Sonya sells womens clothing. She understands her clients demands and always tries to satisfy their needs.
She has applied for a loan to bring in new inventory which will be very popular for the holiday celebrations. Her daughter-in law will be helping her during this busy season and, in the future, when Sonya expands her business.

loan.use: To buy new clothing to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To purchase nail polish, cotton balls, nail clippers, polish remover and medicinals for foot pain for her manicure and pedicure business.

loan.name: Dedevi Ahoefa

texts.fr: Elle est ge de 32 ans et mre de 2 enfants. Elle est marie et exerce comme activit gnratrice de revenus la vente de bijoux. Elle compte dans cette activit 9 ans dexprience. Elle sapprovisionne au Ghana Accra et au Benin Cotonou et revient vendre au grand march de Lom. Elle demande un crdit pour rpondre la demande sans cesse croissante.
texts.en:
She is 32 years old and the mother of 2 children. She is married and sells jewelry in order to earn a living. She has 9 years of experience in this business.
She stocks up at Accra in Ghana and at Cotonou in Benin and then sells at the big market in Lom.
She is requesting a loan to meet ever-increasing customer demand.

loan.use: To purchase jewelry

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Sonia; ella tiene 39 aos. La socia es casada, y tiene 02 hijos; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas, ella trae fruta desde Quillabamab al por mayor y reparte en Cusco. La socia desea el dinero ahora para invertir en su carrito ella tiene junto a su esposo un auto y desea invertir l crdito en la compra de llantas nuevas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de llantas nuevas para su carro.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Introducing Sonia, a member of the Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco (Cuscos New Awakening Communal Bank), that is located in the Huanchac district of the Cusco province.
Sonia is 39 years old, she is married and she has 2 children. She engages in the retail sector, buying and selling fruit: she buys fruit at wholesale price in Quillabamba that she then sells in Cusco. The loan she is now requesting will be used to invest in her vehicle. Together with her husband she owns a car and she want to use the loan to buy new tires. Sonia is asking for a loan to buy new tires for her car.
Sonia is happy with the loan she has been granted and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues at the set deadlines.

loan.use: To buy new tires for her car.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase sewing needles, fabric and thread

loan.name: Rosalia

texts.es: La seora Rosala se dedica al venta de carne de pollo desde hace cuatro aos en puesto propio del mercado, trabaja de lunes a domingo, solicita el crdito ya que desea comprar una conservadora mas grande que la que tiene ya que sus ventas se han incrementado y a veces ya no puede almacenar su mercadera, tiene una nia que depende completamente de ella ya que el padre de su hijita la abandono, vive en casa de propiedad de su madre quien se encuentra en el exterior, es una joven muy trabajadora, esta y responsable, desea lo mejor para su hija por eso le dedica tambin gran parte de su tiempo sin descuidar el trabajo y la educacin de su hija, esta agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Rosala has dedicated herself to selling poultry for the past four years. She has her own site at the market, and works from Monday to Sunday. She requests the loan in order to buy a larger cooler, since her sales are growing and sometimes she doesnt have enough room to store her products.
She has a daughter who depends entirely on her, since the father abandoned them. Rosala lives in a house owned by her mother, who is currently abroad. She is a hard-working and dependable young woman, who only wants the very best for her daughter. For this reason, she dedicates a great deal of time to her business and to her daughters education. She is thankful to the institution for their support.

loan.use: To purchase a cooler and merchandise.

loan.name: Honorata

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito D. Huanchac en la provincia y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Honorata; ella tiene 50 aos. La socia es soltera; la socia se dedica a la atencin D. su tienda D. abarrotes, ella tiene una pequea tienda en la planta baja D. su vivienda, la socia desea implementar y pagara al proveedor D. la compra D. panetones que adquiri el mes pasado y comprar mercadera para el ao entrante. La socia solicita comprar productos bsicos para el ao entrante ella comprara, arroz en bolsas grandes, azcar al por mayor, aceites en bidones. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la adquisicin D. mercadera para el ao entrante.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the NEW DAWN OF CUSCO cooperative bank, which is located in the Huanchac district of the province of Cusco.
Her name is Honorata, and she is 50 years old and single. She dedicates herself to tending to her general store, located in the lower level of her home. She wants to supply her store, pay the vendor from whom she bought fruitcakes last month, and also buy some merchandise for the coming year.
Honorata would like to buy basic products for next year, such as large sacks of rice, sugar at wholesale and drums of cooking oil. The member requests the loan to buy more products.
She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loan.use: To purchase merchandise for the coming year.

loan.name: Amavi Mawussenam

texts.fr: Amavi est ge de 23 ans. Elle gre comme activit de revenus, la vente de bijoux et cumule 6 ans dans cette activit. Elle sapprovisionne au Ghana Accra et au Benin Cotonou et revient vendre au march dadawlato. Elle est ne Lom et habite quartier B. Lobjet de ce crdit sera essentiellement destin lachat de 10 douzaines de Bracelet, 5 douzaines de boucle doreille et 20 boites bijoux.
texts.en:
Amavi is 23 years old. In order to earn a living, she runs a jewelry business. She has 6 years of experience in this activity.
She gets her supplies from Accra in Ghana and from Cotonou in Benin and then sells them at the Adawlato market.
She was born in Lom and lives in the B district. The main purpose of this loan is to purchase 10 dozens of bracelets, 5 dozens of earrings and 20 jewelry boxes.

loan.use: To purchase jewelry

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: God's Grace Kikaaya-Kampala Group

texts.en:
26-year-old Rachael N. belongs to God's Grace Kikaaye Group-Kampala. For the past 4 years, she has been selling electronics in Kanyanya. The jolly and amiable Rachael says she bought the business from a close friend who wanted to move onto something else. Prior to that, she was running a second-hand clothing business.
In many ways, the savings from this business enabled her take root. In the near future, she wants to open wider market horizons for her business, but she says that, for now, her mind is set on equipping her business with the latest in electronics. The happily married mother of four says this business generates 300,000 shillings each month. She is requesting this loan to purchase more electronics to sell.

loan.use: To buy more electronics to sell

loan.name: Wiay Huayna Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal WIAY HUAYNA; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosa; ella tiene 54 aos D. edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia se dedica a la venta D. bebidas como chicha D. quinua, agua D. manzana y chicha morada, ella tiene un pequeo puesto en el mercado D. Wanchaq que trabaja desD. las 10:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio D. este pequeo negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere tener un snack donD. pueda vender las bebidas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar insumos para preparar las bebidas.
Los otros socios se dedican a la venta D. ropa, venta D. artesana, tienda D. abarrotes, venta D. carteras y venta D. tejidos.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
These individuals belong to the WIAY HUAYNA cooperative bank, located in the district and province of Cusco.
The member is Rosa, who is 54 years old, single, and has one child. She dedicates herself to selling beverages such as chicha D. quinua, apple juice, and chicha morada (chicha is a traditional Andean beverage, typically derived from maize).
She has a site at the market in Wanchaq, where she works from 10:00 am until 5:00 pm. By means of this small business, she helps her son get ahead. She would like to have a snack stand where she could sell the beverages. She is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients for making her refreshments.
The other members dedicate themselves to selling clothing, handicrafts, handbags, and knitted goods, and some have general stores.
She is happy about the loan, and commits to making her payments.

loan.use: To purchase ingredients for making her beverages.

loan.name: Wilson Richard

texts.es: El seor Wilson dedicado a la compra y venta de repuestos para vehculo esta actividad lo realiza ya hace 3 aos atrs siendo este su ingreso para mantener a sus pequeos y a su querida esposa la que en algunas oportunidades ayuda a la economa de la familia, dedicndose a la venta de refrescos y otras bebidas, este crdito ayudara mucho a esta familia para agrandar su negocio ya que el Sr. Wilson desea comprar repuestos de vehculo por cantidad para as surtir su negocio es un apersona joven y muy trabajadora esta agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Wilson is dedicated to buying and selling replacement parts for vehicles, an activity he has been involved in for 3 years. This is the means by which he supports his children and his beloved wife, who also tries to help the family financially when able by selling refreshments and other beverages.
The loan will help this family a great deal, by allowing him to expand his enterprise. Wilson would like to buy replacement parts in bulk to supply his business. He is a very hard-working young man, and gives thanks to the institution for the support it provides.

loan.use: Working capital to buy vehicle replacement parts.

loan.name: Dorymar

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Dorymar; ella tiene 32 aos. La socia es soltera; la socia se dedica a la venta de cosmticos, la socia trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza por catlogos y manifiesta que le va muy bien, ella ha ido ahorrando todos sus ingresos y junto a cada prstamo a logrado comprar sus cosas y ahora sus padres le han dado un terreno para que ella lo pueda construir y hacer un pequeo mini departamento, la socia empez con los muros y ha logrado ya poner la base ahora ella desea el prstamo para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas, ella dice que no es fcil hacerlo todo en una sola, puesto que se necesita mucha inversin pero que poco a poco lo est logrando. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the NEW DAWN OF CUSCO cooperative bank, located in the Huanchac district of the province of Cusco.
Her name is Dorymar; she is 32 years old and single. She dedicates herself to selling cosmetics by catalog, and states that things are going very well. She has been saving all her earnings and, together with each loan, has managed to buy her merchandise.
Now, her parents have given her some land to construct a small building. She has started with the walls and managed to put in a foundation, and requests the loan to buy doors and windows. She tells us its not an easy task to do all at once, given it requires a good deal of investment, but she is managing little by little. She requests the loan for the purchase of doors and windows.
She is very happy for the loan, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loan.use: To invest in the purchase of doors and windows.

loan.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Doa Rosa, resiD. en Concepcin Batres, departamento D. Usulutn, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 14, 12 y 8 aos D. edad, se dedica a vender ropa y medicina, tiene 44 aos D. edad, el negocio lo atienD. con sus hijos quienes le ayudan a salir a vender, este negocio fue iniciativa propia debido a la necesidad D. trabajar, no tiene un horario fijo y actualmente necesita D. un prstamo para comprar mercadera para salir a vender D. forma ambulante. Con este prstamo quiere comprar medicamentos y prendas D. vestir, su propsito es darle continuidad al negocio invirtindole cada que hay oportunidad para mantenerse activa con un trabajo que genere ingresos para su hogar y sobre todo para cubra gastos necesarios que enfrenta el hogar. Su objetivo con el prstamo es realizar una buena inversin, cancelar sus cuotas a tiempo, crecer con el negocio y mejorar las condiciones D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in Concepcin Batres, located in the department of Usulutn, with her husband and three children ages 14, 12 and 8. She dedicates herself to selling clothing and medicine. She is 44 years old. She tends to her business with the help of her children, who help her travel around selling her products. She started the business on her own initiative, given the need for her to find work. She does not have a fixed schedule, and currently needs a loan to buy merchandise to sell door-to-door.
She would like to use the loan to buy medicines and clothing. Her plan is to give her business continuity by investing in it every chance she has. She wants to keep active in a line of work that generates income for the home and, most of all, to cover the households expenses.
Her objectives with regard to this loan are to make a good investment, to make her payments on time, to grow the business and to improve her familys standard of living.

loan.use: To purchase medicines and clothing.

loan.name: Silvestre

texts.es: El seor Silvestre dedicado al servicio de transporte hace ya un ao a atrs, hasta el momento solo pudo ahorrar el 15% para la compra de un lnea de ruta, este crdito le servir para poder completar en monto requerido para esta y as poder trabajar de manera segura, el seor es el que mantiene toda la familia con este ingreso ya que su esposa solo se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos, este crdito servir a esta familia para mejorar su calidad de vida ya que incrementara sus ingresos, esta agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: For the past year, Silvestre has dedicated himself to providing transportation services. Up until now, he has only been able to save 15% toward the total amount he needs to buy a route line. This loan will help him be able to gather the total funds required to do this, so that he can secure his work. He alone supports his entire family with this income, given that his wife cares for their children. This loan will help the family improve their standard of living, since it will increase his income. He is very thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loan.use: To purchase a route line.

loan.name: Awatias Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal Awatias est iniciando su ciclo nmero uno en el Centro Focal de Villa Tejada. Cuenta con nueve integrantes. Los negocios de las seoras estn relacionados con el comercio, produccin y servicio, entre estos tenemos: servicio de lavandera, venta de ropa de beb, ayudante de albail, lavado de arena, venta de abarrotes, venta de comida, tejidos de mantas, venta de tennis (zapatos deportivos)
La mesa directiva est compuesta por la presidenta, la seora Maria Elena, la tesorera, la seora Margarita y como secretaria de actas la seora Sonia. Muchas de las seoras indican que ya tiene experiencia en trabajar con crdito, fueron socias de Pro Mujer durante algunos aos y que lo dejaron porque ya no necesitaban, ahora se han visto en la necesidad de contar con un capital para impulsar el negocio o para renovar las herramientas de trabajo. Este es el caso del la seora Mara Elena Q., presidenta de la Banca Comunal Awatias, fue socia durante diez y ocho ciclos. Su negocio es el lavado de arena, ella cuenta que por la zona donde vive pasa un ro que trae arena en la poca de lluvia. Ella y algunas otras personas del vecindario hicieron los trmites para que se dieran lugares para lavar la arena a orillas del ro. La seora Maria Elena le llama puesto, as como un puesto de venta de verduras. Este es un trabajo pesado, pero rentable. El crdito de la seora presidenta es de Bs 2000.- y con el mismo ella piensa comprar carretilla, pala, manguera, trinche, picota, manguera, herramientas que necesita por que las que tiene estn muy desgastadas. Cuando se le consulta sobre lo que ms le gusta de Pro Mujer, la respuesta es el crdito.
texts.en:
The Awatias Community Bank is starting its first loan cycle in the Villa Tejada Centre. There are nine women in the group, and all have businesses in commerce, production, or service such as a laundry, baby clothing sales, builders assistant, sand washing, grocery sales, food sales, weaving shawls, or selling sports footwear.
Sra. Maria Elena is president of the Board of Directors, Sra. Margarita is treasurer, and Sra. Sonia is secretary. Many of the women note that they already have experience taking out loans as they have been members of Kiva partner Pro Mujer for several years. They stopped when they no longer needed financial assistance, but now they have seen the need for money to give a boost to their businesses or to buy some new tools.
Such is the case with Seora Mara Elena Q., president of the Awatias Community Bank, who has been a member for eighteen loan cycles. Her job is washing sand. She explains that a river runs through the area where she lives. During the rainy season it carries a lot of sand. Mara and several other people from the neighbourhood have permits for certain locations on the banks of the river where they can wash the sand. Mara calls her location a stand, just as if it were a stand for selling vegetables. Its hard work but profitable. Her loan of Bs 2000 will be used to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, hosepipe, fork, and a pickaxe--tools she needs as the ones she owns are worn out. When Mara is asked what she most likes about Pro Mujer, she replies the financial assistance.

loan.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, hosepipe, fork, and a pickaxe

loan.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana, de 22 aos de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y dos hermanos, est soltera y no tiene hijos, en su hogar todos trabajan y aportan para cubrir los gastos diarios, por su parte administra una tienda, que logro instalar por la ayuda de su madre, no tiene un horario fijo; por el momento su dificultad es que no cuenta con dinero para reinvertir en mercadera. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de mercadera como detergentes, productos alimenticios como pastas, arroz, frijol, salsas, entre otros que son parte del inventario de su negocio, con esta ayuda estar fortaleciendo la tienda para atender de una mejor manera a los clientes. Suea con tener un negocio amplio, surtido en mercadera, con mucha demanda y formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
22-year old Anaa lives in El Transito, in the department of San Miguel, with her mother and two siblings. She is single and doesnt have any children. Everyone in the household has a job and contributes to daily expenses.
Ana runs a store which she started with help from her mother. She doesnt have a fixed schedule. The problem she has at the moment is a lack of money to buy merchandise, so she is seeking a loan for this purpose. She wishes to buy detergent, and food items like pasta, rice, beans, sauces etc. With this financial help Ana will be improving the store and providing a better service to her customers.

loan.use: to buy detergent, pasta, rice, beans, sauces

loan.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de6, 3 y 2 aos de edad, tiene 35 aos de edad, se dedica a la carpintera, este taller lo inicio gracias a la ayuda de un amigo, para quien l trabajaba pues aprendi bien el oficio y decidi independizase, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00am a 4:00 pm, su ventaja es que ha logrado ganar muchos clientes aparte de que cuenta con experiencia. l est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de materiales para trabajar, materiales como madera de distintas clases de arboles, clavos, pintura y sellador, este prstamo le ayudara a contar con suficiente material para realizar trabajos que han encargado sus clientes, tambin estar brindando un mejor trabajo y servicio. Una de sus aspiraciones es tener un taller amplio, tener maquinaria en buen estado y mantener una buena cantidad de clientes satisfechos con su buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in San Miguel, in the department of the same name, with his wife and three children aged 6, 3, and 2. He is 35 years old and a carpenter. He started his workshop with help from a friend with whom he used to work. He learned the trade well and decided to open his own business working from 8am to 4pm. Jorge has the advantage of many customers as well as years of experience.
He is seeking a loan to buy materials such as different types of wood, nails, paint, and sealer. The money will help him to have sufficient material to complete the orders he already has, as well as provide better work and service. One of Jorges goals is to have a well-equipped workshop with quality equipment and a large number of satisfied customers.

loan.use: to buy materials for his carpentry business

loan.name: Margoth Eliza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Margoth; ella tiene 29 aos. La socia es soltera; la socia tiene 01 hijo, y es el que est en la foto con ella en la reunin de equipo; la socia se dedica a la venta de pollipapas (trae un octavo de pollo frito acompaado de papas fritas y salsas al gusto del cliente) y salchipapas, (salchichas doradas acompaadas con papas fritas) ella tambin tiene su pequea tienda de abarrotes, y acondicion un pequeo carrito de frituras y a partir de las 6:00 p.m. la socia trabaja vendiendo sus pollipapas y salchipapas mientras que su tienda es atendida por su mam, la socia desea incrementar sus insumos y comprar pollos para esta temporada al por mayor ya que a empezado a tener mucha clientela , tambin deber comprar combustible para su cocina a gas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para su negocio y combustible.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Margoth belongs to the Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco (New Dawn of Cusco) Communal Bank, located in the Huanchac district of the province and department of Cusco. She is 29 years old, single, and has 1 child. (He is seen in her photo taken at the group's reunion.) Margoth sells 'pollipapas' (1/8th of a fried chicken with potatoes in a sauce of the customer's choice). She also has a small grocery store plus a little cart selling fried food. After 6:00 pm, Margoth sells her 'pollipapas' and 'salchipapas' (similar to the former but with sausage) while her mother attends the store.
Margoth wants to expand her supplies and buy chickens for this season at wholesale, since she has begun to acquire a larger customer base. Also, she needs to buy fuel for her gas kitchen. Therefore, Margoth is soliciting a loan to purchase supplies and gas for her business.
Margoth is happy with the loan offered and promises to comply with her payments as scheduled.

loan.use: TO BUY INGREDIENTS AND COOKING GAS FOR HER POPULAR MEAL VENDING BUSINESS

loan.name: James Ngugi

texts.en:
For three years, James has been raising poultry and rabbits to sell as a primary business. He also owns rental houses. James earns a monthly income of Kshs.20 000. He is married to Nancy, who is also a businesswoman, and together they have four school-going children.
He has never borrowed from any other MFI. He is applying for his first loan of Kshs.30,000 from KADET LTD. He intends to buy a new breed of poultry to raise and sell and also to buy rabbit feed. With the anticipated profit, he plans to expand his poultry farm and eventually build more rental houses.
In the future, James hopes to educate his children to university level.

loan.use: To buy rabbit feed and a new breed of poultry to raise

loan.name: Melania

texts.es: La Sra. Melania tiene una despensa y un kiosko muy bien surtido en Coronel Oviedo, la misma es Madre y Padre para tres hijos, la mayor tiene 22 aos se llama Yeni Rosana y est siguiendo el tercer ao de una carrera universitaria gracias al esfuerzo constante de su mama. La Sra. Melania tambin comenta que en la casa todos se ayudan, ella se levanta temprano y hace variadas clases de comidas rpidas para el Kiosko y su hija Rosana atiende en la despensa. Esta muy agradecida con la entidad por haber confiado en su persona porque gracias al prstamo que le ha otorgado rpidamente la Fundacin ya compro azcar, harina, aceites, arroz, carne y estn trabajando tranquilamente ahora en su negocio con toda su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. Melania has a small well-stocked grocery store and a kiosk in Coronel Oviedo. She acts as mother and father to three children, the oldest is 22 year-old Yeni Rosana who is in her third year of university studies thanks to the constant effort of her mother. Ms. Melania also comments that at home everybody helps each other. She gets up early and makes various kinds of fast food for the kiosk and her daughter Rosana manages the small grocery store.
She is very grateful to the organization for having confidence in her because thanks to this loan that the Foundation has granted her so quickly, she has already bought sugar, flour, oil, rice, and meat and is now calmly working in her business with her entire family.

loan.use: Buy merchandise such as noodles, oil, rice, meat and more.

loan.name: Raul

texts.es: El Sr. Ral, vive en la casa de su madre el Sr. Es elctrico tiene un taller elctrico en la misma casa donde vive, el mantiene a su Mama, trabaja todos los das es muy conocido en la zona por el buen trabajo que realiza, el prstamo invertir para la compra de repuestos herramientas para su taller, joven soltero independiente con muchas ganas de salir adelante trabajador, con ganas de superacin esta agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Raul is a single independent young man, eager to get ahead in his life. He lives with his mother, is electrician and runs a workshop in his house. He takes care of his mother, works every day of the week and is well known in the area for the good service he provides. He will invest the loan in the purchase of replacement tools. He is grateful to the institution for the support.

loan.use: Purchase of replacement tools

loan.name: Urpis De Confraternidad Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Damiana; ella tiene 65 aos de edad y es viuda y tiene 1 hijo; La socia se dedica al negocio de ferretera, ella vende diferentes materiales para la construccin de casas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de ferretera. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales para la ferretera como clavos, tornillos entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de ropa, venta de repuestos para bicicleta, restaurant, venta de comida y carpintera.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD. This bank is located on the Cusco district belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
The member is Ms. Damiana. She is 65 years old, a widow, and has 1 child. The member has a hardware store where she sells various material for housing construction. The member works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and by means of this business the member is giving her children a good start in life. The member would like to improve and expand her hardware business. The member is requesting the loan to buy material for the hardware store such as nails and screws, amongst others.
The other members work in the sale of clothing, the sale of bicycle parts, restaurant, the sale of food and carpentry.
The member is happy for the loan and promises to adhere to the payment of her installments.

loan.use: The member requests this loan to buy material for a hardware store such as nails and screws, amongst others.

loan.name: Isabel Carolina

texts.es: Isabel, es una joven de 22 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazn, es madre soltera de una nia llamada Rub de un ao de edad, no tiene casa propia por lo que alquila vivienda con una amiga. El negocio es la venta de ropa un hermano y su amiga le ayudan a vender, la situacin econmica le llevo a dedicarse a este comercio, este negocio es el que le ayuda a salir con los gastos y necesidades diarias, realiza sus ventas en los pueblos cercanos. Ella necesita de un prstamo para invertirlo en mercadera ya que carece de recursos econmicos para impulsar su negocio, su compra seria en ropa pues para esta temporada la demanda aumenta y quiere aprovechar para tener mejores ingresos. Este prstamo le ayudara muchsimo ya que al realizar la inversin estar aumentando su inventario y ofreciendo a los clientes ms productos con la ventaja que la ropa es un producto que en cualquier poca se vende por lo que sus riesgos son mnimos. Su sueo es algn da tener su propia casa, crecer a su hija que es su principal motivacin para seguir adelante luchado por mejorar el futuro, para tener una mejor condicin econmica.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 22, sells clothes. She lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazn department. She is the single mother of a one year old daughter named Rub. She does not have her own house, so she rents a house with a friend.
Her business is selling clothes; a brother and her friend help her sell. The economic situation drove her to dedicate herself to this trade. This business is what helps her with the expenses and daily necessities. She makes her sales in nearby towns.
She needs a loan to buy merchandise. She does not have the financial resources to boost her business. She will buy clothes as the demand increases during this season. She wants to take advantage of that in order to get better earnings.
This loan will help her a great deal. Upon making this investment, her inventory will increase. She will be selling more products to her customers. She has the advantage that clothing is a product that sells in any season. Therefore, her risks are minimal.
Her dream is to one day have her own house and to raise her daughter. Her daughter is her primary motivation for fighting to improve the future and having a better financial situation.

loan.use: To buy clothes

loan.name: Irma Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Irma; ella tiene 53 aos. La socia es soltera y trabaja en ESALUD, ella es empleada pblica en esta entidad, la socia desea el crdito para comprar unas pastillas porque debe iniciar su tratamiento contra la gastritis y el seguro no le proporciona las pastillas blandas para ella poder tomarlas, tambin deber comprar otros medicamentos que no tiene el seguro social, la socia se mostro un poco triste al respecto y solo manifest que desea hacer su tratamiento con medicamento de mejor calidad para que no le afecte a sus riones ni a su ya agravada gastritis. La socia solicita el prstamo para iniciar su tratamiento.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Irma belongs to the Nuevo Amanecer Del Cusco (Cuscos New Dawn) Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district in the Cusco province and department.
Irma is 53 years old. She is single, and she works at ESALUD (Health Social Security). She is a public employee in this entity.
She wants the loan to buy pills because she needs to start treatment for gastritis. The insurance does not cover the soft gel tablets for her to be able to take them. Also, she will need to buy other medications that the social security does not have.
She was a little sad about this, and she expressed that she only wants to have her treatment with the best quality medication. She wants this so that her kidneys are not affected, and her gastritis is not aggravated. She is requesting the loan to start her treatment.
She is happy with the loan that was granted, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loan.use: To start her treatment

loan.name: Silvia Karina

texts.es:
Silvia de 30 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Fortn es madre soltera tiene tres hijos de 11, 8 y 4 aos de edad que estudian en una escuela del gobierno (aparecen en la foto). Con dedicacin ella ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para darles una buena vida a sus hijos.
Comenz con la idea de tener su propio negocio hace tres aos atrs pero no pudo realizar su negocio sino en este ao hace 8 meses atrs. Poco a poco pudo surtir ms su pequeo puesto de venta de herramientas hasta convertirlo en una pequea ferretera. Ahora trabaja desde las 11h00am hasta las 18h00pm vende cables, focos, balanzas, herramientas etc.
Quiere darle un buen futuro a sus hijos por eso quiere continuar con su negocio comprando con el prstamo cables, pernos, herramientas. Una de sus metas es convertirse una distribuidora exclusiva en repuestos y herramientas de la costa.
texts.en:
Silvia, age 30, lives in a periurban zone named Fortn. She is a single mother, and she has three children. The children are 11, 8, and 4 years old. They (appearing in the photo) attend a government school. She has worked with dedication for a long time in order to give her children a good life.
Three years ago she started with the idea of having her own business. She was not able to establish her business until eight months ago. Little by little she was able to better stock the place where she was selling tools, and she turned it into a small hardware store. She now works from 11:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. She sells cables, lights, scales, and tools, etc.
She wants to give her children a good future. Therefore, she wants to continue her business. She will use the loan to buy cables, bolts, and tools. One of her goals is to become an exclusive distributor of replacement parts on the coast.

loan.use: To buy cables, bolts, and tools

loan.name: Donatha

texts.en: Donatha owns a business selling food crops. She is 36 years old and married with 4 children aged between 2 and 13 years old. Her husband works as a soldier. Donatha has been selling food crops for 10 years. She decided to request this loan to buy more peanuts, sorghum, wheat flour, millet and soybeans to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to increase her sales. She would like to be a supplier of these food crops in the future.

loan.use: to buy more food crops to sell

loan.name: Rosalina Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosalina, tiene 28 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y tortillas, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazn, donde vive con su hija de ocho aos de edad y su familia ya que es madre soltera, ella aprendi el negocio de su mam, el negocio es propio, su horario es de 7:00am, este trabajo lo realiza por la necesidad de ayudar a su hija y darle lo que necesita para crecer sanamente y poder estudiar. Rosalina est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de materia prima como maz, quesillo, chicharrn, que son los materiales necesarios para hacer la venta, este prstamo ayudara a mantener los niveles adecuados de materiales, adems tendr que producir ms procurando aumentar la demanda en los clientes. Sus sueos son salir adelante con el negocio, crecer y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia, adems darle la educacin y el sostenimiento necesario a su hija.
texts.en:
Rosalina, age 28, sells pupusas (flatbread stuffed with meat, cheese, or vegetables) and tortillas. She lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazn department. She lives with her eight year old daughter and her family because she is a single mother.
She learned the business from her mother, and the business is her own. Her schedule starts at 7:00 a.m. She does this work out of the necessity. She needs to help her daughter and give her what she needs in order to grow in a healthful way and to be able to go to school.
Rosalina is requesting a loan to buy ingredients like corn, fresh cheese, and chicharrn (fried pork rinds). These are the ingredients she needs in order to make sales. This loan will help her keep an adequate amount of ingredients. Also, she will have to produce more as she tries to increase the customer demand.
Her dreams are to get ahead in the business, to grow and improve her quality of life and that of her family, and to give her daughter an education and the necessary support.

loan.use: To buy corn, fresh cheese, and chicharrn

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: La seora Mercedes Lpez Benitez es comerciante, tiene su negocio sobre la avenida Ayolas, tiene un negocio muy bien surtido. Tiene muchsimos clientes porque tiene muy buena ubicacin, trabaja desde hace 2 aos en su negocio. Es una seora sacrificada y luchadora, es madre soltera siempre so con tener su negocio propio para poder educar a su hija y mantener la casa .Con el prstamo obtenido ha comprado mas arroz, harina, aceites, lcteos, bebidas y as poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Agradece mucho a la Institucin por haberle brindado la oportunidad de sacar adelante su negocio por medio del crdito ya que pudo comprar mercaderia para el negocio como fideos, panificados, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
Mercedes Lpez Benitez is a merchant. She has a very well stocked store on Ayolas Avenue. She has a lot of customers because she has a very good location. She has been working in her business for two years. She is a selfless and tenacious woman. She is a single mother, and she has always dreamed of having her own business in order to raise her daughter and maintain the house.
With the loan she got she bought more rice, flour, oil, dairy products, and drinks. She did this to be able to provide her customers with better service.
She is very grateful to the institution for having provided the opportunity to get ahead in her business via the loan. She was able to buy merchandise like noodles, baked goods, rice, and other products for her business.

loan.use: To buy sugar, rice, noodles, baked goods, and other products

loan.name: Sacaba Group

texts.es: La representante del grupo es la Sra. Roxana es la lder del grupo vive en la zona de villa obrajes vive en la casa de sus padres es joven independiente tiene una tienda de barrio tambin realiza el preparado de tucumanas, el dinero del crdito lo utilizara en la compra de mercadera para surtir su tienda, comprara refrescos, galletas y dulces, etc. es grupo de personas jvenes con actividad econmica independiente , el prstamo lo invertirn para incrementar su capital con la compra de mercadera, estn agradecidas con la institucin por el apoyo brindado en la otorgacin del crdito.
texts.en: Roxana is the representative and the leader of this group. She lives with her parents in Villa Obrajes, a neighborhood of La Paz. She is an independent young woman and runs a corner shop in her neighborhood, where she also bakes tucumanas, a tipical pastry. She will use her loan to buy merchandise to stock in her store, like sodas, biscuits, candies, etc. This is a group of young people with independent business activities and the loan will be invested to increase the operating capital and to buy merchandise; they are grateful to the institution for the support granted through this loan.

loan.use: Purchase of stock merchandise

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, and the rental of a yolk to remove earth.

loan.name: Silvia Del Carmen

texts.es: Silvia D. 33 aos D. edad, resiD. en Corinto departamento D. Morazn, vive con su esposo Ramn Antonio tienen cuatro hijos Adonis D. 15 aos, Jos Neris D. 13, Dania Marlenis y Brayan Ulises D. 6 aos D. edad, quienes dependen econmicamente D. ellos, ella se dedica a la venta D. antojitos y papas fritas realiza las ventas a diario desD. muy temprano se prepara para preparar la venta y luego sale a trabajar a casas D. los vecinos a realizar los oficios domsticos y por la tarD. se coloca en la venta en su carretn. Ella est necesitando un prstamo para arreglar el carretn ya que en este realiza las ventas D. papas fritas, tambin comprara insumos para la preparacin D. antojitos (papas, aceite, condimentos), esta ayuda le ser muy importante ya que tendr en buenas condiciones la herramienta importante para la venta que es su carretn, y tambin contara con los materiales necesarios para seguir en su negocio. Sus sueos son grandes como ver a sus hijos superados sacarlos adelante con el apoyo D. prstamos a travs D. esta institucin e ir mejorando la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Silvia is 33 years old. She lives in the Corinto department of Morazn with her husband Ramn Antonio. They have four children (Adonis who is 15, Jos Neris who is 13, and Dania Marlenis and Bryan Ulises who are 6 years old) who depend on them economically. She works selling snacks and french fries, making sales daily. Very early she gets ready to make sales, and later she goes to work at the houses of her neighbors to do her domestic work, and in the afternoon she works selling in her small cart.
She needs a loan in order to fix her cart in which she already sells french fries. Also, she will buy ingredients for the preparation of snacks (potatoes, oil, condiments), this help will be very important so that this important tool for her work, her cart, is in good condition. Also she will have the materials necessary to continue her business. Her dreams are big, like seeing her children overcome. to move her children ahead in life with the help of loans through this institution, and to continue improving the quality of life of her family.

loan.use: To repair Silvia's food cart and to buy potatoes, oil, and condiments

loan.name: Angela

texts.es: ngela reside en Semsembra, departamento de Morazn, tiene 30 aos, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 14 y 13 aos de edad, ellos alquilan la vivienda y se dedica a la venta de lcteos y pupuseria desde hace cuatro aos, negocio que nace por la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo con ingresos para solventar necesidades del hogar. Los lcteos los vende por la maana y las pupusas de 6:00pm a 8:00pm, ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de productos necesarios para hacer la venta como chicharrn, condimentos, tomates, el crdito le ayudara a realizar las compras en mayor cantidad obteniendo un mejor precio de los proveedores y con la posibilidad de ver mejores ganancias. Suea con crecer en sus negocios y que a travs de estos pueda obtener ganancias que le permitan ahorrar y comprase un terreno para construir su propia casa, mejorando la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
ngela lives in Semsembra, in the department of Morazn. She is 30 years old, and she lives with her husband and two children who are 14 and 13 years old. They rent their home and she has worked selling milk products and pupusas (maize dumplings) for 4 years. This business was born from the necessity of helping her husband with income to meet the household necessities.
She sells milk products in the morning and the pupusas from 6-8pm. She is asking for a loan in order to buy the things she needs to make sales, like sausage, condiments, tomatoes. The loan will help her make purchases in greater quantity and thereby get a better price from the wholesalers, meaning the possibility of seeing greater profits.
She dreams of growing her business and through it being able to make an income that would permit her to save and to buy land to build her own home, improving the quality of life for her children.

loan.use: To buy sausage, condiments, and tomatoes

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy an industrial stove for Norah's food sales business

loan.name: Selva

texts.es: La Sra. Selva es comerciante hace mas de 20 aos, tiene su despensa bien surtida en el Barrio San Juan, es una persona muy luchadora porque es madre soltera y tiene a su cargo a sus padres mayores de edad. Tiene una hija de 13 aos bien educada y que es la razn de su lucha constante, trabaja desde las 5 de la maana hasta las once de la noche en su despensa-carnicera, tambin tiene venta de pollo al espiedo. Se acerco a la Fundacin Paraguaya para solicitar apoyo crediticio para comprar bebidas, comenta que esta muy contenta de ser bien acogida y por la confianza puesta en su persona. Asegura que invertir bien su prstamo para poder devolverlo en tiempo y forma, para poder seguir trabajando con la institucin.
texts.en:
Ms. Selva has been a business woman for more than 20 years. She owns a well-stocked grocery store in the barrio of San Juan. She is a hard worker because she is a single mother and is responsible for her elderly parents.
She has a well-educated 13 year old daughter who is the reason for her constant struggle. She works from 5:00 in the morning until 11:00 at night in her grocery/butcher shop. She also sells rotisserie chicken.
She approached the Fundacin Paraguaya to request a loan to buy beverages. She tells us that she is very happy to be welcomed and for the confidence placed in her.She assures us that she will invest the loan well so that she can repay it in a timely manner in order to be able to continue working with the institution

loan.use: To purchase beverages.

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO; Este banco est ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra: Ana Maria; ella tiene 30 aos. La socia es soltera y tiene 01 hija, ella estudi cosmetologa, actualmente ella tiene un saln de belleza en el tercer paradero de ttio, la socia le puso de nombre Luanis como su pequea hija; La socia desea el prstamo para invertir en la compra de secadoras profesionales para su saln de belleza, la socia tambin comprar lquidos para hacer los permanentes, tintes de colores y de este modo ella podr dar mejor servicio. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadera para su saln de belleza.
La socia est feliz con el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Nuevo Amanecer Del Cusco community bank. This bank is located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. The member is Ana Maria. She is 30 years old. The member is single and has one daughter. She studied cosmetology. Currently she has a beauty salon in the third suburb of Ttio. She gave it the name "Luanis" like her little daughter. The member wishes the loan in order to invest in the purchase of professional dryers for her salon. The member also will buy liquids for perms, dye and, in this manner, she will be able to give better service. The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her beauty salon.
The member is happy with the loan granted and she promises to make her payments at the established deadlines.

loan.use: The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her beauty salon.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Spare parts for his mill

loan.name: Victor

texts.es: Vctor tiene 37 aos, vive con su esposa y su hijo en su casa propia. Desde que era un nio aprendi las tcnicas agrarias, hoy lo hace de manera independiente, por lo que han transcurrido 7 aos dedicndose a la siembra de papa y de otros productos de mayor escala. En muchas ocasiones su esposa y sus hijos le apoyan en esta tarea, asimismo cra animales como: pollos y cuyes que le sirve para el consumo propio familiar, as como en la generase algn ingreso luego de venderlos en la feria de su localidad. Hasta el momento Vctor considera que las ventas de sus cosechas son rentables, y eso lo anima a intensificarse en esa actividad, por lo que espera en el futuro comprar maquinaria y contratar personal. Es el crdito nmero 4 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que sern gestoras del prstamo que solicita ya que le ser muy til en el progreso de su actividad econmica. Con el crdito que recibir, comprar insumos para la agricultura como semillas y abono; asimismo contratar peones para que le ayuden en dicha siembra.
texts.en: Victor is 37 years old. He lives with his wife and their son in his own house. Since he was young, he learned farming skills. Today, he farms independently as seven years have passed dedicating himself to sowing potato and other products on a larger scale. On many occassions, his wife and their children help him with this work. Additionally, he raises animals like chicken and guinea pigs that feed his family and also generate some income when sold at the local market. When Victor realized that selling his harvest was profitable, it encouraged him to intensify his work since he hoped in the future to buy machinery and hire workers. This is his loan number four with MFP. He is very happy to know that he has financial support. Additionally, he is happy to be part of his community bank because all the members are people he knows, are responsible and very unified. He is thankful to all the people who will be loaning the money he is requesting since it will be very useful in the progress of his economic activity. With the loan that he will receive, he will buy inputs for farming such as seeds and fertilizer. Additionally, he will hire workers to help him with said planting.

loan.use: Purchase seeds and bags of fertilizer, and also hire laborers.

loan.name: Bruno

texts.es:
Bruno es pequeo comerciante, dedicado al trabajo para dar el apoyo a su familia, hoy en da tiene su propio negocio una pulpera que inicio con una venta de su propiedad de tierra herencia de sus padres. Luego para invertir ms en productos, hace un financiamiento en Afodenic aumentando sus niveles de venta al ofrecer ms variedad en sus mercaderas, con precios accesibles al cliente.
Con este nuevo prstamo lograra la compra de productos de consumo en granos bsicos de arroz, frijoles, azcar, bidn de aceite, maz, golosinas, productos lcteos, cajillas de huevo entre otros, siendo estos los que ms se venden.
texts.en:
Bruno is a storekeeper and is dedicated to his work so that he can support his family. He currently has his own general store that he started by selling the property he inherited from his parents. Later, to invest in more products he sought financing from Afodenic, increasing his sales and offering more variety in his merchandise, with more accessible prices for his clients.
With this new loan he will be able to purchase basic consumer products, such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, sweets, dairy products, cartons of eggs, etc. These are the products that sell the most.

loan.use: To buy consumer products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, and corn in order to increase his sales

loan.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Banco de emprendimiento antiguo que se encuentra en su 3er ciclo integrado por 9 integrantes los cuales todos viven en la zona del torno La presidenta la Sra. Marianela de edad de 23 aos, su negocio es el trasporte del Torno a Santa Cruz trabaja con la renta de su vehculo hace 3 aos , y como segunda actividad cuenta con la agricultura en la provincia de Valle grande hace 4 aos, su estado civil convive con el Seor Hugo, quien es transportista, tienen un hijo pequeo, el dinero del crdito lo invertir en el mantenimiento de su vehculo ya que esta necesitando algunas reparaciones, es una seora muy trabajadora que se dedica a estas dos actividades por el bienestar de su familia. La secretaria: es la Sra. Paulina vive en la zona del torno hace 4 aos, Su negocio es la venta de refrigerio en la zona del torno ambulante hace 1 aos. Estado civil convive con el seor Abundio de actividad chofer moto taxista, los seores cuentan con 4 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el dinero del crdito lo utilizara en la compra de abarrotes e insumos para preparar sus platillos. Los clientes estn agradecidos con la entidad por confiar nuevamente en ellos y apoyarlos cuando mas lo necesitan.
texts.en:
This long-standing community bank is in its third loan cycle. The group has 9 members who all live in El Torno.
The bank's president, Marianela is 23 years old. Her business is a transport business between El Torno and Santa Cruz. She has been making income from her vehicle for three years. Her second business activity is farming in Valle Grande province. She has been doing this for four years. Marianela lives with her partner Hugo who is a haulage contractor. Together they have a young son. Marianela will invest her loan money in having her vehicle serviced as it needs some repair work doing to it. She is a very hard-working woman who works in her two businesses for the well-being of her family.
The bank's secretary Paulina has lived in El Torno for four years. Her business is selling light refreshments in El Torno as an itinerant street vendor. She has been doing this for one year. Paulina lives with her partner Abundio who provides taxi services in his 'mototaxi' (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting cargo or passengers). They have four school-age children. Paulina will use her loan money to buy groceries and supplies to prepare her meals with.
These clients are grateful to the institution for having placed trust in them again and for supporting them when they most need it.

loan.use: To have maintenance work done on her vehicle

loan.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is 31 years old and single. He has been selling cement and foodstuffs for seven years. Innocent will use this loan to purchase more cement and foodstuffs to sell. With the new profits from his expanded business, he plans to build a house. In the future, he would like to become a sole distributor of cement.

loan.use: to buy more cement for sale

loan.name: Marie Jeanne

texts.en: Marie Jeanne has owned a business selling fresh dairy products for 8 years. She is 45 years old and widowed with two children. With this loan, she will buy more liters of milk and donuts and bread to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business for savings. She works hard so that in the future she could own a dairy.

loan.use: to buy more milk to sell

loan.name: Rogelio

texts.es: Don Rogelio, de 40 aos de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazn, se dedica a sembrar granos bsicos, l est casado y comparte su vivienda con su esposa y cinco hijos: Iris de 14 aos, Idalia de 12, Iveth de 7, Flor de 4 aos de edad y Ana de un mes de edad, don Rogelio se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos aos ya que creci en un hogar donde su padre de esta actividad les dio lo necesario para su crecimiento. El Solicita un prstamo para la recoleccin de granos bsicos, esta actividad consiste en pagar mozos para que le ayuden a recoger la cosecha de maz y frijol, y es a travs del prstamo que l pagara a quienes le ayuden y de esta manera dejara lista la cosecha para venderla y otra parte para el consumo familiar- Su objetivo es seguir en esta actividad agrcola ya que es el sustento de su familia y con la ayuda de los prstamo espera cultivar un terreno ms grande para las prximas temporadas.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 40 years old and lives in Corinto, located within the Morazn department. He is a farmer who raises basic grains. He is married and shares his life with his wife and five children; 14 year old Iris, 12 year old Idalia, 7 year old Iveth, 4 year old Flor, and one month old Ana. Rogelio has been farming for many years, as he grew up in a home where his father was a farmer and he was able to provide for them in this way.
He is asking for this loan so that he can harvest his grains. This involves hiring field hands to help him gather the harvest of corn and beans. He will use the money from this loan to pay his helpers and prepare the harvest for sale and part of it to feed his family.
His goal is to continue this activity because this is his familys sustenance. With the help of this loan, he hopes to be able to farm a larger area next season.

loan.use: Pay for field hands

loan.name: Nola

texts.en:
Nola is 38 years old, married and has four children between the ages of four and seventeen. Currently, all four of her children attend school.
Nola sells fresh dairy products, which she has done for six years. She works together with her husband. Nola will use the loan to purchase more bread and milk to sell.
With the new profits from her expanded business, Nola plans to reinvest in the business for continuous growth.

loan.use: To buy more fresh dairy products to sell

loan.name: Svetlana

texts.es:
La seorita Svetlana es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en anticretico ya hace mucho tiempo, en una casa que est ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz. Svetlana es empleada de TOYOSA, vendiendo autos y realizando comercio exterior; adems se dedica a elaborar documentos de transferencia y para esta segunda actividad necesita una computadora.
El crdito lo utilizara justamente para la compra de una computadora. Es as como obtiene sus ingresos para su hogar. Es su primer crdito y el anlisis socioeconmico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder a un crdito.
texts.en:
Svetlana is single and does not have any children. She lives in an anticrtico house (a special rental arrangement available in Bolivia) located in the Alto San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

Svetlana is employed by Toyosa, selling cars and doing external business. She also creates assignment documents and needs a computer for this second job.

She will use the loan to buy a computer because this is how she obtains her household income.

This is her first loan and the socioeconomic analysis completed qualifies her to be able to receive a loan.

loan.use: To purchase a computer to prepare assignment documents, which is her second job.

loan.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El Seor Fredy Fernndez Braez vive en concubinato y es padre de familia de un hijo al cual apoya y ayuda en su educacin junto a su pareja, hace como un ao que vive con su pareja ellos viven en su chaco cuentan con una casita de madera que les sirve de refugio y de techo para dormir, es por eso que l trabaja como agricultor y como moto taxista en la localidad de Ivirgarzama, en el cual esta hace mas de 1 ao como socio activo, el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta cantidad de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad, rapidez y eficiencia. El sindicato cuenta con paradas y turnos para cada afiliado, en diferentes puntos de la localidad de Ivirgarzama donde las personas acuden para solicitar dicho servicio.
Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un prstamo de nuestra institucin cuyo destino ser la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumpli su ciclo de trabajo y mejorar el servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitir tambin mejorar sus ingresos y consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fredy Fernndez Braez lives with his partner and is father to one son who he supports and helps in his education, along with his partner. He has lived with his girlfried for one year. They live in a small wooden house that serves as a refuge and a place to sleep. It is for this that he works as a farmer and as a mototaxi driver in the area of Ivirgarzama, where for more than one year he has been an active member. The service he provides is profitable due to the high quantity of people that request this service due to its ease, speed and efficiency. The union has stops and turns for each affiliate in different points of the area if Ivirgarzama where people go to request this service.
This is the first time that the client has obtained a loan from our institution. It will be used to purchase a new motorcycle since the one he has currently has already completed its working cycle and so he can improve the service for his customers which will also improve his income and consequently his quality of life.

loan.use: Purchase a new motorcycle for his job.

loan.name: Las Fresas Group

texts.es:
El grupo que a continuacin presento tiene por nombre "Las Fresas", es un grupo de mujeres de la localidad de Calvario del Carmn, pertenecen al municipio de San Felipe del Progreso, esta localidad alberga una gran presa conocida como la "presa de Tepetitlan", como se encuentra la presa hay gente que se dedica a pescar charales para venderlos en el tianguis, lo que est gente hace es limpiarlos y freirlos, tamben los guisan, o hasta los hacen en tamal para vender.
En este grupo hay una integrante que tiene como actividad lo que mencionaba, se llama Celestina Marquz E., la seora es ama de casa pero aparte sale a pescar a la presa y prepara los charales de diferente manera.
El Grupo las "Fresas" lo integran 13 mujeres trabajadoras, son mujeres Mazahuas, hablan este idioma indigena que es parte de la cultura del pueblo de San felipe del Progreso, y no solo el idioma sino su vestimenta muestra su cultura. Le nombraron as a su grupo porqu dicen ella que no encontraban otro nombre, ya haban mencionado varios pero todos ya estaban ocupados por otro grupo, hasta que una de las integrantes dijo: las Fresas, a todas les causo gracia y asi se llamaron, tamben para sonar un poco original ante los dems grupos.
Los nombres de las mujeres son los siguientes: 1.-Maria S. M., la seora tiene 40 aos de edad, su actividad es una tienda de abarrotes. 2.-Irma G. G., tiene 30 aos, su actividad es la compra, cria y venta de borregos. 3.- Marcelina C. Sncehez, , es una mujer joven de 20 aos, se dedica a criar pollos para vender. 4.-Juana M. C., tiene 45 aos, se dedica a la compra- venta de borregos de engorda. 5.-Veronica S. M., tiene 19 aos, cria borregos 6.-Antonia J. S. tiene 36 aos, tiene una tienda de abarrotes 7.-Lorenza G. C., tiene 54 aos, se dedica al campo y criar becerros para vender. 8.-Rosa V. N., tiene 42 aos, se dedica a criar pollos y borregos 9.-Paula P. G., tiene 38 aos, se dedica a criar animales 10.- Irene T. C., tiene 38 aos, tiene una tienda escolar 11.-Elidia L. L., va hacer mam, y se dedica a una tienda afuera de la clinica 12.-Eusebia Meja Segndo, tiene 55 aos, y se dedica a vender ganado, cria y vende vacas o toros. 13.- Celestina M. E., tiene 27 aos y se dedica a la pesca, vende charales preparados listos para comer.
La comunidad es muy humilde en general, toda la gente es de escasos recursos, no tienen estudio, por mucho la secundaria, la mayoria de la gente no sabe leer, solo se dedican al campo y a criar animales, los seores como oficio saben albaileria, y muchos salen a trabajar a ciudad de Mxico o E.U.
La Seora Maria S. M. encabeza la lista de los nombres en la foto aparece vestida de un sweter blanco, un vestido tipico Mazahua de color azul con franjas rojas y calcetas azul cielo, es la segunda de la foto de izquierda a derecha.
Doa Maria tiene 40 aos de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo, en total tuvo 8 hijos lamentablemente uno de ellos fallecio, ahora solo estn 7 hijos, 4 hombres y 3 mujeres, por el momento de ella depende un nio de 11 aos, estudia la primaria, sus dems hijos ya trabajan y unos ya tienen su propia familia.
La actividad de doa Mari es criar becerros, y va utilizar su crdito para pagar dos milpas de zacate que le fiaron, el zacate lo ocupa para darle de comer a sus reces, tambien quiere comprar una becerrita.
Doa Mari nos comenta que una dificultad es de el mes de Abril hasta Septiembre porqu no tiene para darles de comer ya que no tiene terreno, y es en epocas de lluvia, lo que hace es pagar una renta por cada animal mensual, para que puedan comer el pasto y dems en una hacienda que est cerca de su comunidad.
El deseo de doa Mari es poder tener un espacio para sus animales como un terreno para sembrar y no comprar el zacate que lo dan caro, tamben para poder guardar los animales.
Tamben doa Mari platica que al vender un animal se lo quieren pagar barato, su meta es venderlos a un buen precio para que le salga la inversin.
texts.en:
The group which is presented has the name "Las Fresas." It is a group of women from the area of Calvario del Carmen, belonging to the municipality of San Felipe del Progreso. This area is home to a large dam known as the "Dam Tepetitlan." Because of the dam, they are people that are dedicated to fishing chub to sell at the market. What these people do is clean and fry, or even stew them or make tamales to sell.
In this group, there is a member that has the job which has been mentioned. She is named Celestina M. E.. She is a housewife but she goes fishing and prepares the chub in different ways.
The "Las Fresas" group has 13 hard-working female members. They are Mazahuas women. They speak this indigenous language which is part of the cultulre of the San Felipe del Progreso village, and not only does their language demonstrate their culture but also their dress.
They named their group this way because they say that they couldn't find another name. They had mentioned various but all were already taken by other groups until one of the members said "las Fresas." This caused them to laugh and so they used this name, as well as to sound a little original beside the other groups.
The names of the women are the following:
1.-Maria S. M., She is 40 years old and has a grocery store. 2.-Irma G. G., She is 30 years old and she buys, raises and sells sheep. 3.- Marcelina C. Sncehez, , She is a young woman of 20 years and she is dedicated to raising chicken to sell. 4.-Juana M. C., She is 45 years old and is dedicated to buying and selling fattened sheep. 5.-Veronica S. M., She is 19 and raises sheep. 6.-Antonia J. S. is 36 years old and has a grocery store. 7.-Lorenza G. C., She is 54 years old and is dedicated to raising calves to sell. 8.-Rosa V. N. is 42 years old and is dedicated to raising chicken and sheep. 9.-Paula P. G. is 38 years old and is dedicated to raising animals. 10.- Irene T. C. is 38 years old and has a school shoop. 11.-Elidia L. L. is a mother and is dedicated to a shop outside the clinic. 12.-Eusebia Meja Segndo is 55 years old is is dedicated to raising and selling cattle and bulls. 13.- Celestina M. E. is 27 years old and is dedicated to fishing and selling chubs prepared ready to eat.
The community is very humble in general. All of the people come from scarce resources. They don't have secondary education. The majority of people don't know how to read. They are only dedicated to farming and raising animals. The men know masonry work and many leave to work in cities in Mexico or the U.S.
Maria S. M. is head of the list of names. In the photo, she appears clothed in a white sweater, a typical Mazahua blue dress with red stripes and sky blue socks. She is the second in the photo from left to right.
Maria is 40 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband. In total, she had eight children. However, one of them died. Now there are only seven children: 4 boys and 3 girls. At the moment, one 11 year old boy depends on her. He is in elementary school. Her other children work and one has his own family.
Mari's activity is raising calves. She is going to use her loan to pay two two corn fields of grass that they rented. They occupy the fields to give food to their animals. She also wants to buy a calf.
Mari tells us that one of the difficulties of the months from April until September is feeding her animals since she doesn't have land and it is the rainy season. What she does is pay a monthly rent for each animal so they can eat the pasture and the others can go to a farm that is near the community.
